92a4: zhes bya ba gzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rigs mtha' yas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser zhes bya ba yod
92a5: de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sde zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi kham
92a6: rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'das pa rnam par
92a7: gnon ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro kun rnam par 'joms mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
92a8: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo ro// de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yid gnyis can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid

92b1: gnyis yang dag 'joms par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mthong ma thag tu nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mad ba chags
92b2: na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
92b3: rnam par bltas pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
92b4: gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab gom pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen rab gnas shes bya ba
92b5: yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rdo rje rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i
92b6: yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa padam mdo na par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang
92b7: chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me tog ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od mi 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhi
92b8: la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams legs 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'das

93a1: pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i go cha thogs med ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rdul bral sde zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i
93a2: yang mad ba chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
93a3: tshab shin tu gnon ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom/
93a4: ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba lhun po chen po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs//
93a5: te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nyi ma sgron ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo do// de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshon gyi'i
93a6: phung po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' dri med 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba
93a7: btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams skar mda' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byar
93a8: chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'phel ba'i blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'byung gnas shes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'byung gnas de na de bzhin

93b1: gshegs pa gong na med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas shes bya ba btad do// de'i yang mdab chags na
93b2: 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i gdugs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnga sgra nas bya
93b3: babatang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das /
93b4: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho na
93b5: gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs snang zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sa la zhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pas
93b6: lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thu bo zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab
93b7: gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
93b8: mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'

94a1: rgyal tshab grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
94a2: kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sprin ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po zhes
94a3: bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshabartsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal bzang po zhes bya ba
94a4: yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdapa
94a5: chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ dan de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yos pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
94a6: rgyal tshab phug spos shes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/
94a7: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab spos dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog ces
94a8: bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la tshes kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma'i snying po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams can dan gyi gsung

94b1: zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan khang pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sras shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab
94b2: chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen drabs khebs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs partson 'grus mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
94b3: dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros mtha' yas shes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma 'jigs byed me tog mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal
94b4: bo zhes pa ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba dbyangs mtha' yas ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par
94b5: snang byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dra ba can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba bkang ngo // de'i yang
94b6: bdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
94b7: dpa' rgyal tshab brjed med ngar zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mang 'a chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gyi gsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
94b8: kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'byor pas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yid bral zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba thams cad

95a1: nye bar sgrub mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phan 'dod ces bya ba btang do// de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna
95a2: tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad ston ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas shes bya ba
95a3: ro/ / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs bsgrags don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
95a4: dpa' rgyal tshab go cha mtha' yas shes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
95a5: kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba gtsug na nor bu zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' ya
95a6: bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i snying stobs go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten
95a7: gyi khams pad ma'i gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhi de gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen
95a8: tog ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das

95b1: des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nam mkha' rnam dag spyod pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po mchog dpal zhes bya ba
95b2: bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bzang po dbyangs shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mar me byed ces bya ba yod de/ den no/
95b3: bzhin gshegs pa khru mchog mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khru mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig
95b4: rten gyi khams me tog dri nim zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzangs shes bya
95b5: ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
95b6: chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya mtsho zhes bya ba btad do/ / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs mtha' yas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhug
95b7: te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshad med blo gros shes bya ba btang do// de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
95b8: gshegs pa phas ma pham pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phas ma pham pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na

96a1: 'jig rten gyi khams rdul ces bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa mngon togs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho ning gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshar 'dzin
96a2: pa zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi 'ams smos 'das shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas mu med spos shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stod te/ bcod
96a3: ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgya
96a4: po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron ma 'chang zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces kyab yod de/
96a5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/
96a6: 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtul
96a7: bas byin ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rna ma dag ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang
96a8: chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing

96b1: la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mdzes pa chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
96b2: pa tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams
96b3: dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbang pos byid zhes bya
96b4: ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'otsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
96b5: ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba yon tan byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mad pa chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal shes bya ba yodade/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal na
96b6: bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes bsags shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes bya ba yodan
96b7: de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par bsams pa'i sngon lam yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas shes
96b8: bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe 'ang gzhes la chos

97a1: na du la na sa ma / ga nams mas na/
97a2: pa ye shes smos shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi
97a3: khams khang pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khang pa sngo zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang sten te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rnam par sems shes bya ba
97a4: btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes spos shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
97a5: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kyi lhun po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs
97a6: 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba btad do// de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas shes bya ba/
97a7: yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde bdag ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na
97a8: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi mdzad

97b1: bdag po zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing ga /
97b2: la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri ma med pa zhes bya ba tang ngo // de'i yang mad ba chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa/
97b3: sems can gyis bsam pa yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab
97b4: chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa
97b5: ba zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams so sor bag yangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtser 'jug rtsom pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
97b6: ston te/ / bcom ldan 'das das byang chub sems dpa' rgyal cha ga gtu brtsams pa'i go cha shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdang chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu so sor yang dag gnas shes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshes
97b7: pa thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer pad ma sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo /
97b8: de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sku yang

98a1: xxx/ xxx
98a2: sa kyi 'gos shes bya ba zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byed chu tu grang bshad to/ / de byang chubasams dang des snang bachen par gyur ste/ gsung bstsam na ma sa ma cang
98a3: xxx/ xxx
98a4: gras dad pa sang dga'adas par 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad nas bya ba med de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa shAm thub pa zhes bya bzhugs te tshanang gzhes la 'jis te/ byang chub sems pa 'i byi
98a5: rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/ mthu lta bu 'di ni de'i yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi gom bags kyis 'as sa
98a6: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag kyi ba dang snyen bapar gyi ba da ngos na pa sa dang 'jig tan gyi khams mi mjed deng bdag par bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ngas
98a7: srul pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dus la dbas par shes nasang shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bstas pa'i byang chu grangs pa ga pa na thar gyi stobs kyi go dgas kyis padam brgyad zangs nas 'jig
98a8: khams mi mdzod gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su gtor to// de nas pad ma de dag 'jig cen gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi bar dag las 'das nas rgyal po'i khang 'a pa laH

98b1: xxx/ xxx
98b2: xxx/ xxx
98b3: ma dag bya mas das padag da pa dza / / gas kyang pa nasamadapa 'di sa pa med/ ma sa
98b4: zam po brgyad pa/ / mtha' yas mkhyen mang pagang zag zhu mchog gtso// rang byung mtha' yas chos rnams thugs su rung // khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mtha' las rgya chen gda'// 'jig rten khrims rnams kun tu snang bar mdzas
98b5: de dag sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos nas/ / zla ba'i khyad par kun tu 'a ba dang // sangs rgyas blta dang phyag kyang bgyi slad du// mkhas pa de dag rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mchis// byang chub go bgos dpa' bo gang mchis dag
98b6: mi mjed 'jig rten khams su rab gnas pa/ / de dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste// de dag pa dadang gzugs dang grags pas 'phags// de dag gi cha dngas pas pa 'jigs shing // sems can smid pa blang dul
98b7: dag zhugs/ / byang chub mchog la ji ltar reg gyung ba// 'jig rten rnam 'dren mchog la de dag na// ji skad mngon du chos rol brgyad ces na// bdud dmas gzhom dang byang chub 'tho ba slad du// de nas nu bkru ba'i sprul pa rnams
98b8: gang yin de la shAkya thub pas gsungs/ / 'dren pas gang dag cig gis de bstan nas// zil tshig da tsho garnams thos gyur te/ dga' dang makul rjes su 'di rang nas// bde gshegs phyag 'tshal de dga' 'od zer byu /

99a1: sprul pa de dag der ni mi snang nas// gang dag de bzhin gshegs la thu thub// de dag gang nas mchis shing ming ci zhes// de tshe 'khor kyang spurnams zing zhes byed// 'khor rnams pani po de dag gus pa yis// rgyal
99a2: bal ni zhu bar mi spro ste/ de tshe 'jig rten mgon po'i sprul pa sprul// de tshe dge slong kun dga' bzang po byung // mgon po zhu ba 'di zhu de dag gang // zhus nas kyang ni mi gda' ma mthong gyur// de dag su lags de dag su yi lags//
99a3: mgon po bshad cing the tsom bsal du gsol// smon lam dpa' bo ldan pa'i go cha ltos// de yis byin gyis brlabs nas 'dir lhags te// shar phyogs kyi na 'jig rten khams kyi tshul// grangs med dag nas de dag lhags pa yin//
99a4: dpa' bo 'jig rten pan phyir gang lhags pa// rnam par bltas nas dong bar gyur pa ste/ bsam pa dag pa byang chub phyir spyod pa// de yi smon lam de ni de 'dra'o// de dag dge bas nges par sangs rgyas mthong // de dag 'dir ni de la phying
99a5: mi lug/ tshul khrims kyis kyang dman par mi 'gyur te/ thos pa mang zhing pha rol phyin pas 'phags// de dag thabs shes pa la shin tu bslabs// mngal gyi gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur te// 'khor ba'i tshe na tshe rabs tshe rabs su de dag cho
99a6: kyi sems rgyud brjod mi 'gyur/ / rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon du phrad// rtag tu 'phags pa rnams dang 'grogs par 'gyur// dpa' be de yis sems can 'dir mthong rnams// rtag tu de la rab tu 'byung ba 'thob// mthong ma
99a7: thag tu dge bas de 'dra ste/ / gang dag gzhan ma brjod pa de dag mang // dpa' bo de yi yon tan gang yod pa// ming du bsgrags kyang mthar thug 'gyur ba med// dpa' bo shin tu gnas pa de yi ming // de tshe bud med gang gis thos gyur ba//
99a8: deni byin chad bud med da do po mi 'gyur// sems can dam pa'i mchog tu de 'gyur ro// skyes pa bud med gang gis ming thos shing // thos nas dela'ang dga' ba skyed byed la/ sangs rgyas zhing der sgron lam 'de bas byed pa// lus ni/

99b1: nas ni der yang skye bar 'gyur// zhing yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba yin// skyes pa bud med 'on te gzhan yang rung // gang gis ming thos nam zhig dang byed pa// thams cad byang chub chen las nyams mi'i gyur// gang dag gcer bu'i sem/
99b2: can ma gtogs par// thos nas su zhig dga' ba skye mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyis kyang de ni yod ma gsungs// 'on kyang de dag dge dang ldan par 'gyur// gang dag bsam pas ming yang thos pa ni// ji ltar rtsi yis skyon rnams sel byed
99b3: bzhin/ / sems can de dag gis ni der mthong ba// byang chub don du des 'gyur the tsom med// gang zhig ba la sha yi mdab thogs shing // de dang der ni rtsi dag byed gyur na// de tshe kun nas sman gyi stobs kyis su// sus kyang der ni mel
99b4: tshig mi 'gyur/ / gang tshe sbrul gdug gzi brjid drag po yis// dug gang de dag mi gdug byed 'gyur te// sa yi steng nas kun tu ston byed na// de 'dra'i sman brkos pas ni ci zhig bya// sbrul gdug dri ni gang dag snom byed pa// sbrul de tham
99b5: cad 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur/ / de ltar rtsi sman 'dra ba'i mi de ni// ming gis sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur// de tshe phyogs bcu dag tu bsgrags pa na// dpa' bo de yi ming ni sus thos pa// de yi ming gis las ni 'di byed de// bud
99b6: med gang zag la ni reg mi 'gyur/ / gang gis mthong dang sti stang byed ci smos// de ni rgyal bas dge slong gang sprul pa// kun dga' bzang po zhes ni bya ba des// rgyal bas de skad bsgrags pa de 'dra ba// byang chub bzhugs pa su mchis de
99b7: la zhus/ / kun dga' bzang po go cha dpa' bo'i ming // 'jig rten khams 'dir yod ces des thos na// zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis brjod par bya// de ltar bde bar gshegs pas zab bstan pa// rgyal ba'i byang chub yid ches dka' ba
99b8: yi/ / sems can dge ba chung dang ldan pa lhags// de ltar de yi tshe ni cung zad gnas// kun dga' 'di ni sems can mchog yod de// de ring kho nar 'khor du lhags par gyur// 'jig rten mgon po gang dag 'dir lhags pa'i// go

100a1: bsngags pa phyogs bcur bzlog ma nus/ / kun dga' bzang stong rin chen 'byung gnas dang // dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang ni dang dpon bzang // yon tan sbas pa mkhas dang de bzhin du// dpa' bo bzang stobs gang yin/
100a2: de la ltos// chu zhes bya ba dang ni chu lha dang // bzang skyong de bzhin dge slong ci 'dra rna mas// ji ltar skyob 'gyur dge slong de dag ltos// de dag rnams kyi go cha de bas ma yas// don yod ces ni yongs su bsngags gyur pa// de dag gis ni
100a3: don yod go cha bgos/ / de dag mthong ba' don yod 'gyur yin na// de dag bsnyen bkur byed pa smos ci dgos// kun dga' gang su dag gis de dag mthong // gang dag su yis ming yang thos gyur pa// de dag nas yang byung chub dgas
100a4: med/ / de dag nam du'ang log par ltung bar mi 'gyur// de dag thams cad brtson pas tshogs pa yin// de dag thams cad shes pas tshogs par gyur// rtag tu tshul khrims phung pos de rtag gnas// thams cad theg pa mchog la de
100a5: ltar 'dug/ kun dga' sangs rgyas zhing 'dir phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten da ltar gang dag su gnas pa// dpa' bo de yi go cha 'dod gyur pa// de la rgyal ba kun gyis bsngags pa brjod// gang gis bsngags brjod rgyal ba de dag
100a6: kyang / byang chub sems dpas de tshe der shes te// shAkya khyu mchog 'jig rten mgon po dang // byang chub zhugs pa'i dpa' bo dag blta'o// de thos nas kyang gsol ba gtab gyur pa// mgon po mo mjed 'jig rten khams su
100a7: mchi/ / rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la bskor byas nas// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad lhags// dge slong de dag gi yang ming thos nas// de tshe byang chub mchog tu 'dun pa bskyed// gang dag ming dang 'dun pas byang chub
100a8: bzhugs/ / de dag rgyal bas byang chub der lung bstan// bskal pa grangs med dag tu las byas shing // mi dge bsgrubs pa gang dag su yong pa// de phyir snyigs ma'i dus na de dag ni// nga dang lhan cig sangs rgyas zhing du

100b1: lhags/ / nga yis byang chub mchog 'di thob gyur kyang // de tshe sems can blta bar spro ba med// gang dag phyi dus dge slong rnams 'byung ba// rtsub dang gtum dang shin tu rtsub pa yin// de tshe kun tu 'jigs pa thos nas su//
100b2: yang dang yang du brtson 'grus stobs bskyed cing // mu ge'i dus su zan rjen sbyin pa byed// de dag rnams kyi sbyin pa rtsub pa yin// de dag 'di la gus pa che byas nas// phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po de yi tshe// srog kyang btang nas
100b3: don ni bya snyam ste/ / nga yi chos mchog spol zhing 'dzin par byed// dus dan ni mo dge'i las rnams kyi// smon lam gnas kyang 'jig rten dag na yod// 'di na las de dag ni byas pan/ de'i tshe na brnyas pa'i tshul du 'gyur//
100b4: de dag der ni 'di 'dra'i chos thos nas// de tshe der ni chos min 'du shes 'gyur// chos 'di rgyal bas gsungs pa ma yin zhes// 'jig rten phyin ci log la kun dga' ltos// de tshe dge slong slob pas 'du byed la// rtag
100b5: pa cung zad med ces sgro thob pas/ / de tshe mgol me 'bar bzhin du rtogs// 'chi med thob par bya phyir ma lus brtsal// bstan 'di rab tu rnam par 'jig thos nas// der ni lha yang sdug bsngal dag tu gyur// de tshe 'jig
100b6: pa mthong na mi rung zhes/ / da lta'i dus su shi yang sla snyam sems// bag cha med pa'i sgrogs pa sgrogs pa yi// drang srong che de de ring bdag cag mthong // 'dren pa mchog gi zhal du lta byed cing / kye ma rgyal bas bshad ces
100b7: yid rangs po/ / dge slong bsam gtan byed pa dag kyang mthong // dbang thob rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mkhas gyur pa// 'di na ting 'dzin shes rab pha rol phyin// de dag phyi ma'i dus su ji ltar mthong // sdig pa'i dge slong stobs dang
100b8: ldan 'gyur zhing / / de tshe tshul ldan shin tu tshar cad 'gyur// gnas khang gnas pa tshegs kyis 'thob 'khrur zhing // de tshe lha yid shin tu mi dga' 'gyur// kye ma kye ma bstan pa rab tu 'jig/ gang gi don du de tshe dka' spyod pa/

101a1: de dag dge slong sdig pas tshar bcad 'gyur// bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di la ltos// 'dir ni phan tshun kun tu dga' bar 'gyur// nges pa rnams la de dag bsngags min brjod// sangs rgyas la ni 'brus
101a2: long byed pa dag/ de dag khyim na gnas pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dge bsnyen ma dang 'dra bar byed 'gyur zhing // de na de dag lag pa gcig tu byed// rgyal ba'i bstan la mgus gyur nas su// byang chub mchog kyang spong bar
101a3: byed par 'gyur/ / dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu 'che 'gyur te// de dag rtag tu nges pa rnams kyis spongs// khyu mchog rwa chag ma gyur ma rungs pa// de bzhin tshul khrims ldan pas rnam par thong // de tshe tshul khrims
101a4: ldan par byas 'gyur zhing / / de tshe dge slong sdig pas brnyes tshul 'gyur// 'jigs chen phyin ci log gi dus su ni// skye ba thob byos bag kyang yod par bgyis// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la brtson 'grus skyed//
101a5: de tshe 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i dge slong rnams dang phrad ma byed// de yi tshe na sdug bsngal gnas par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i
101a6: ba snying stobs kyi go cha bgos 'di lta ste/ / dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bsdum pa rkyod par byed pa'am// brkyang ba bskum par byed pa'i skad cig des de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi
101a7: khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
101a8: ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la nod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang dam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la

101b1: kun tu ston pa'i lhamachog san gsol lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das byas bka' stsal pa/ rags kyi bcom ldan 'das thu ma mang bas// stob pa dang gan nas/ 'gyur ba mi ma 'a'am/ gas dang/
101b2: bcom ldan 'das de ste lags so// 'jig rten gyi khams de yang ma ba chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ldan nas bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa ma tshan med du zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshon
101b3: gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ / bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rdul tshab tshangs dbyung sa ro zhes bye ba btad do// de'i yang ma da pa chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzin med ces bya ba yod de/ de na
101b4: bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan nyid gcig pas mchod ces bya ba btang ngo // /
101b5: de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad mi'i mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
101b6: 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma rab tu gtor ba'i char ba zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
101b7: rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs brtsegs shes bya ba ba dang do/ de yang yadab chags na 'jig rten
101b8: gyi khams 'jam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mu khyud 'dzin

102a1: ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/
102a2: ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshabs 'dzin rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha' rnam par dag pa ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid
102a3: mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen gdugs shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na
102a4: 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ud/
102a5: pa la zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med khru mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
102a6: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems dpa' med ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams
102a7: cad so sor bag yangs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zab mo 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mda' chags na 'jig
102a8: rten gyi khams yon tan 'byung gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang

102b1: mas da rnam 'ang/ sa bya pa nga// dam ya ma pa gsan / u0f7f'am ldan nas dang / dU / nga/ /
102b2: te'atsho zhi gshes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sdezhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gnod med cos bran sri
102b3: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs par gshegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
102b4: mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ud pa la dmar pos khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spros kyis rgyags mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
102b5: ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos mchog ldan po zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kha lo skur ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gcis
102b6: shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston/ / bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba rtul ba mtha' yas shes bya ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs
102b7: chen zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par gnod ces bya
102b8: btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs shing 'jigs su rung bas mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'a

103a1: zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rab grags shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes bya ba
103a2: yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sngon ma zhes bye ba bzhugs te 'tshanang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mngon du 'gro zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i
103a3: mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me sgron zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
103a4: dpa' rgyal tshab me 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'bar zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang
103a5: ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'dren ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin/
103a6: gshegs pa shin tu gyen du gshegs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
103a7: mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi nor bu zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
103a8: sems dpa' rgyal ba rab kyi blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdapa chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje 'byung shes bya ba med de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs

103b1: 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab yon tan 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams daro can zhes bya ba yod de/
103b2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
103b3: mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
103b4: ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog
103b5: ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skar rgyal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams skya reng zhes bya ba
103b6: yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba ded dpon zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang
103b7: mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sam
103b8: dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs

104a1: te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can na
104a2: bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dbang phyug ces bya ba btang ngo //
104a3: de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
104a4: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tshab pad ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs shes
104a5: bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes brtson 'grus shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya
104a6: pab yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde byed ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab
104a7: chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shi 'phos med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma mngon pa 'phags dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
104a8: chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog bzang zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yo ba zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu dpung mgo mtho ba zhes bya ba bzhum

104b1: te'atshe nang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu spro ba zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu kun tu 'khrugs shes bya
104b2: yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ci'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab snyid rje chen po 'ag cha zhes bya ba btang ngo //
104b3: de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa mtha' yas pas gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
104b4: ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mda' chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skabs kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
104b5: khyu mchog mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshogs chen zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi
104b6: khams bai dUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te mtsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ses tshad med pa'i
104b7: go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
104b8: ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig che zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kun gyi khyu mchog ces

105a1: bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba dga' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyis
105a2: khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs mchog mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyan ras
105a3: gzigs nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi phrad ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi phreng ba can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar gyi
105a4: rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags ni 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen
105a5: dra bas khebs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad ma'i dpal zhes
105a6: bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la ches kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de
105a7: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na pad ma zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gsar can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho
105a8: zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig rnam par dag ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/ den /

105b1: bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na
105b2: 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gsung mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab 'od byed ce
105b3: bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon du 'phags pa shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
105b4: 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i
105b5: spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs sde zhes bya ba btang ngo do// de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dang ldad zhe
105b6: bya ba yod de/ / de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdapa
105b7: chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skar mda' 'dzin ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
105b8: yid gnyis rnam par 'joms shes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams can dan spos shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid gnyis pa'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing

106a1: gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa'i sde zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/
106a2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dgra rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba ba
106a3: go/ de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' 'brung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
106a4: sems dpa' rgyal tshab don gyi blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes
106a5: bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' bo zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod de/
106a6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don gyi blo gros shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang med pa
106a7: chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par bsgoms shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
106a8: dpa' rgyal tshab pas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yid gnyis mnan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis thams cad yang dag par 'joms 'byung zhes

106b1: bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod/
106b2: den de bzhin gshegs pa rim pa'i sras shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron ma 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na
106b3: 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bshes
106b4: gnyen zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
106b5: ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rab btang
106b6: zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thams cad bshes gnyen zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams
106b7: sprin chen zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba skar rgyal zhes bya ba btang ngo //
106b8: de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma snang ba'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des

107a1: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags shes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa khyad par can zhes
107a2: bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab mngon du 'phags shes bya ba btingango // 'i ya ma ba chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i gan
107a3: shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bshes gnyen
107a4: grags ldan zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i lhun po mngon du 'phags shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho'i
107a5: gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/
107a6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba dbang po zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chag
107a7: na'ajig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
107a8: byabadzab dpa' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med dbying kyi ro zhes bya ba bzhugs /

107b1: tsha gagasas chos kyang ldan te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa rgyal chab shin tu ba gnas shes bya ba gang // de 'i yang mdang chag pan 'jig tan gyi khams tag tu
107b2: ces bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chubs pas dpa' rgyal cha bsgrags
107b3: byed ces bya ba btang ngo / / de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zas kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
107b4: kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal 'tsha ba thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan gsung zhes bya ba yod de/
107b5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba btang
107b6: de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams 'dren pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzangs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
107b7: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na rin chen zhes bya ba btang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de la sogs pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rgyal
107b8: bo'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la na da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste lpags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'ba' shig

108a1: 6/ / phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// da'acha lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mdzod cig pa zhes bya
108a2: ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des de'i 'og tu 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems/
108a3: dba' rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu skar gyi phreng bas snang ba chen po mthong ste/
108a4: gsung bskul ba'i sgra de yang thos nas bcom ldan 'das de la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsung gsal ba'i sgra grag pa de su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rgyu skar gyi phreng ba 'ang
108a5: nas byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhi
108a6: gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// 'khor der yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi byab pa'i gon ba
108a7: pa dag 'dus te/ rgyu skar gyi phreng ba 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na ni sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji lta bu'i go cha dag gis go cha bgos pa'i go cha de lta bu dag gis stongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
108a8: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu skar gyi phreng bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub

108b1: de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bskur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag maHba
108b2: bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal po// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig/ nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/ nyamang ba nyung ngam/ spyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam
108b3: zhes sman gsol la/ rigs kyi bu khyed sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang shes bzhin du spyod par gnas par byos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir pa
108b4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rma skar gyi phreng bas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bskor ba yang byas nas song ste/ de 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum brkyong bar
108b5: byed pa 'am/ lag pa brkyang bas skum par byed pa'i skad cig des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug ste/ de rgyal po'i 'ab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la dang
108b6: ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam
108b7: nga ba nyung dam/ bskyod pa yang dam/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mdzod gcig pa snyan gsol lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
108b8: chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi phreng ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyan mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/

109a1: bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la sogs pa skye ba gcig gis thogs bgrangs me dang thag tu med pa dag lho phyogs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa
109a2: dag tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de'i tshe nub phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig
109a3: gas thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
109a4: gshegs pa rdul med rdul bral rnam grol 'das pa dang / ma 'ongam pa dang / da ltar byung ba la ma chags pa'i go cha'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas de dag gi dang po byang chub sems dpa' khru mchog mtha' yas
109a5: sangs rgyas kyi me tog kun du ston pa'i go cha zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba dang / bcom ldan
109a6: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam zhes spun gsol te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de
109a7: nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci mthong nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir 'ongs// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
109a8: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid na mchis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams

109b1: thams cad mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang mthong lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di snyam du bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du
109b2: 'dod par bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan yang blta bar bya'o snyam du mi sems lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid na mchis kyang de bzhin
109b3: gshegs pa thams cad mthong lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bskyed pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis
109b4: lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang dag mchi ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus mchi lags so// de'i tshe nub phyogs nas de/
109b5: bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i me tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od dang / bkod pa dpag med dang / 'od zer dpag med dang // 'od dpag med dang / khyu mchog dpag
109b6: med dang / rnam par gnon pa dpag med dang / rgyu skar gcig pa dang / rgya skar gyi phreng ba dang / rin chen gdugs dang / rgyu skar rgyal po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang / 'od kyi rgyal po dang // 'od zer mngon par
109b7: 'phags pa'i dpal dang / 'od zer mtha' yas dang / khyu mchog dang / khyu mchog mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang / thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs dang / sprin chen 'od zer dang / dra ba can gyi 'od zer dang / sangs
109b8: rgyas me tog 'od zer dang / pad ma'i khru mchog me tog dang / ri'i rgyal po dang / zla ba'i yon tan bdag po dang / 'od zer rab tu btang ba dang / dpung mgo shin du zlum pa dang / mthong ba don yod dang / rtse mo mngon par

110a1: 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / pad ma'i rtse mo mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba
110a2: gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags te/ lhags nas kyang rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom
110a3: ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das
110a4: pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod ming sgrogs shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang
110a5: chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo skong par nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ de nas byang chub sems
110a6: dpa' des snang ba chen po de mthong zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod ming sgrogs de la dam 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan
110a7: xxx/ xxx
110a8: xxx/ xxx

110b1: dag 'das par 'jig can gyi khams pa mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
110b2: kyi chos kyang ston te/ sdang ba de dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra grag pa de ni de'i yin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag skyes te/ de dag gi ming brjod pa tsam gyis
110b3: sogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa don yod med sgrogs la byang chub sems dpa'
110b4: sems bskyed ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo skor bar nges pa'i go chas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
110b5: shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig/ nga'i tshig gis gnod pa
110b6: chung ngam/ nyam nga banyud ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ zhes snyan yang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bskor
110b7: yang byas nas song ste/ de 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rgya ngo bar byed pa 'am// brkyang pa bskum par byed pa'i skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams
110b8: de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams me mjed 'dir 'dug ste/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs

111a1: gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam ra ba nyung ngam bskyod pa yang ngam/
111a2: stobs dang bde bar dag pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de na yod ming sgrogs spun gsol lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de sman mi mnga'
111a3: 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bad ba dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// de'i tshe byang phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yong med snon
111a4: 'asogs te/ bcom ldan 'das don yod rnam par gnon gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du don yod khru mchog dang / don yod 'od zer dang / brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang / sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / brtson
111a5: pa mtha' yas dang / sa la rin po che dang / gdugs gcig pa dang / rgyu skar bkod pa dang / dkon mchog 'brung gnas dang / tsan dan khang pa dang / tsan dan spos kyi 'od dang / 'od mtha' yas dang / 'od kyi dkyil
111a6: 'khor can dang / lhun po rnam dag dang / thogs pa med pa'i spyan dang / sman mtha' yas dang / rin chen 'byung dang / kun gyi dpal dang / sangs rgyas me tog 'byung ba'i dpal dang / blo gros rab gnas dang / mthA
111a7: yas rnam par gnon dang / don yod dpal dang / rin chen rnam par gnon dang / go cha mtha' yas dang / bkod pa mtha' yas dang / nam mkha' dkyil 'khor 'od zer dang / mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro dang / tsa
111a8: rgyal po dang / bag tshab mi mnga' ba dang / spu zing zhes byed pa'i 'jigs bral dang yon tan rgyal po'i 'od dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi blo sgrub me tog dang nam mkha'i rigs dang / nam mkha'i da ro dang / nam

111b1: mkha' bkod pa'i nga ro dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang / gzhan dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi
111b2: mjed ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der lhags te/ lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
111b3: med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
111b4: bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rim pa'i bu zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rim pa'i bras snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung
111b5: bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so/ / thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od kyi snang ba kun du gda' ba de dang // gsung bsngal ba'i sgra grag pa de su'i lags/ bcom
111b6: ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs
111b7: pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ mthu de ni de'i yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa de ni da lta byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdod sems can thams cad yang dag par
111b8: par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston te/ mthu de lta bu de ni de'i yin no// 'khor de na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

112a1: dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa dpe med pa sems pa dag chos bstan pa de nyan par byed de/ de dag gi ming brjod pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu nges
112a2: par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rim pa'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi
112a3: ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig/ nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung
112a4: ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes spyan yang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rim pa'i bu bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag
112a5: 'tshal te/ 'di lta steng per na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa brkyang bar byed pa 'am/ brkyang ba bskum par byed pa'i skad cig des 'jig rten gyi khams de na mi snang bar gyur nas/ de 'jig rten
112a6: gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug ste/ de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la nad gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
112a7: 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen po spyan gsol lags so// de nas
112a8: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rim pa'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu ci sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ bcom ldan 'das de gnod pa chung ngam/ spyan mi mnga' 'am/ bde bar gnas

112b1: sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sman chen po la sogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du de bzhin
112b2: gshegs pa pad ma'i dpal 'brud dang / seng ge'i dpal dang don grub dang / dpal sras dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa dang // shin du rab tu gnas pa'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa lhun po dang / spyan rnam par dab pa dang / don
112b3: yod pa'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / spos kyi glang po chen dang / spos kyi dpal dang / spos kyi lhun po dang / spyan chad med pa dang / spos brtsegs dang / rin chen lhun po dang / shin du rab gnas dang / shin tu rab ka nA
112b4: pa'i rgyal po dang / sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dzin dang / me sgron dang / skar mda' sgron ma dang / brtson 'grus don yod dang / shin du yang dag par brtags kyi go cha dang / seng ge dang / sems
112b5: can gyi kha lo sgyur ba dang / rab mchog rab tu gnas pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la sogs pa grangs med dpag tu
112b6: med pa dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba dang / bcom ldan
112b7: 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / / bam po dgu pa// de'i tshe steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag
112b8: tu med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan spos kyi 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yul mtha' yas par mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes

113a1: la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab ra dpag tu med ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
113a2: nga ro dpag tu med kyis snang ba chen po de mthong zhing / / gsung bstsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yul mtha' yas par mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po ga la ba der
113a3: sang ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od gda' ba de dang / gsung bskul ba'i sgra grag pa de su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal
113a4: pa/ rigs kyi bu 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba
113a5: bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 'khor der yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpe med pa sems pa dag 'dus par gyur te 'khod do// gsol pa/
113a6: bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mche bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan
113a7: 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig/ nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa ya ra yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam
113a8: zhes spun yang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nga ro dpag tu med pa bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la bskor ba byas nas song ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/

113b1: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rtsod par byed pa'am/ brkyang ba rkum par byed pa'i skad cig des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir
113b2: 'dug ste/ de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa gA la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
113b3: 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang
113b4: bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa yul mtha' yas par mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po snyun gsol lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa
113b5: rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de spyan mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yul mtha' yas
113b6: par mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yid
113b7: gnyis yang dag 'joms dang / rgyu skar bzang po'i rgyal po dang / nyin mdzad dang / 'od mdzad dang / lhun po 'od dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang / rnam par dag pa'i 'od dang / zas kyi gdugs dang / spos kyi
113b8: gdugs dang / rin chen gdugs dang / tsan dan gyi khang pa dang / dga' ba'i dpal dang / ri rab phung po dang / rin po che'i 'od dang / sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / rnam par dag pa'i sung

114a1: dang / bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba dang / spu zing zhes byed pa'i 'jigs pa dang / bral ba dang / rin chen go cha mtha' yas dang / bla na med pa'i 'od zer dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dra ba can gyi 'od kyi rtog
114a2: dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rgya'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi gong dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la sogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
114a3: sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba dang / rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dag gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
114a4: song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig
114a5: rten gyi khams sangs rgyas pad ma'i me tog 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku kun du ston pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes
114a6: la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan bral zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan
114a7: bral gyis snang ba chen po de mthong zhing gsung bstsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so/ / thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku kun du ston pa'i dpal de ga la ba der song
114a8: bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od gda' ba de dang / gsung bsul ba'i sgra grag pa de sa'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das

114b1: des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byad shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
114b2: shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpe med pa'i go cha bgos pa rnams la byang chub sems
114b3: dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to/ / gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i skad du 'jig rten
114b4: gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig/ nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang
114b5: ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes sun yang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan bral bcom ldan 'das de la phyag 'tshal nas song ste/ 'di lta ste// dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa
114b6: zhig gis lag pa skum pa brkyod par byed pa 'am/ brkyang ba bskum par byed pa'i skad cig des 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song
114b7: nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/
114b8: nyam nga ba nyung ram/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyisku kun du ston pa'i dpal snyun gsol lags so// bcom ldan

115a1: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// da ltar de bzhin gshegs/
115a2: pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku kun du ston pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku kun du ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du de bzhin
115a3: gshegs pa pad ma bkod po'i khyu mchog dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang / 'od mtha' yas sangs rgyas me tog 'byung dang / rin chen sa la dang / rin cheni zla ba'i khyu mchog dang / rtsi'i rgyal po dang / sman dang ye shes/
115a4: mchog dang / mngon du 'phags pa'i go cha dang / lhan po gong na med pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / me tog brtsegs dang / me tog rab gtor dang / rtag tu mdzes pa'i 'od zer
115a5: dang / bla na med pa'i 'od zer dang mi g.yos rnam par gnon dang / gom pas rnam par gnon dang / gom pa mtha' yas pas rnam par gnon dang / smon lam mtha' yas dang / spobs pa dpag med dang / khyu mchog
115a6: mtha' yas dang / smon lam nges pa dang / mnga' 'gyur mdzad dang / skyo med 'gyur mdzad smon lam dang / dmigs pa'i go cha dang // sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang / 'byung ba'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de
115a7: bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang / gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgo nas byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
115a8: zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de'i tshe lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bkra shis

115b1: bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa don grub ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don thams cad grub ces
115b2: byab bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ de ltar de la sogs pa bcom
