276a2: pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ de dag ni nga la stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi lus la stod cing rang gi lus chos kyi ston dam pa la 'jog par 'gyur/ rang gi lus las chos kyi 'od zer 'byin par 'gyur// bla na med
276a3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang chos ston par
276a4: 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa gdugra mtshan du sems can mang po zhig yongs su gro
276a5: yang da dung du sems can rnams zad par ma gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde khyod gang de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni 'di legs so legs so// sman gyi sde 'di lta ste/
276a6: dper na skyes bu la la zhig phyug cing nor che ba la longs spyod che ste/ nor dang 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bde ba mang po dang ldan la/ bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shes 'tsho ba'i mi mang po dang ldan te/ de nor gyi brang
276a7: po mngal zhing dang kun dga' ra ba mang du bdag cing / 'di lta ste/ nas dang / gro dang / 'bras dang / bal sran dang / sran chung lasags pa 'bru mang du bdag pa zhig yad la ma des dpyid kyi dus la 'bru thams cad kyis pan
276a8: ba kha nas dus gzhan zhig gi chos ban de dag thams cad yangs su smin par gyur pa dang / mi des 'brid dang de dgas sor 'dog ste/ gzhag nas kyang dpyid kyi dus kyi bar du zos nas yang 'debs babazhin

276b1: du sman gyi sde sems can rnams kyang sngan las byas pa'i las de dag thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ba dang de la bsod nams kyi zhing tshal te dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed do/ / bskyed nas kyang dge ba'i chos
276b2: lanan tan gyis sgrub ste chos thams cad 'phel bar byas nas dga' ba dang mgu ba bskyed de/ sman gyi snga dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems des bskal pabye ba'i bar du chud mi za'o// sman gyi sde de bzhin du byang chub sems
276b3: dpa' sems dang pa bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa brgyan za ba'i chos can du nam yang mi 'gyur te/ mngangan chos thams cad rab tu shes so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pas
276b4: lam ji lta bu mthong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i rmi lam du 'jigs pa mang po mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ las thams
276b5: da yongs su sbyor ba'i phyir ro/ / sems can sdig pa'i las can gyis ni sdug bsngal mi bzang ba sel bar mi nus so// de ni sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong yang 'jigs pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang
276b6: chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i rmi lam du ji ltar 'jigs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde ma rab tu 'bar ba mthong ste// des nas byang chub sa
276b7: dpa' des bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad tshig par rig par bya'o/ / sman gyi sde gnyis su ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa des chu thub cing rab tu brug pa mthong yang 'jigs par ma
276b8: bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sman gyi sde de bzhin du gti mug gi bcings pa thams cad las bzlog nas sdig pa byang bar byas pa yin no// sman gyi sde gsum du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed

277a1: pa'i rmi lam na 'jigs pa chen po mthong ngo / / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag gi lus kyi mgo bregs pa mthong yang sman gyi sde de la nges 'jig
277a2: par mi bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug bregs pa yin te/ bdag ni 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba las rgyal ba yin no snyam mo// de sems can dmyal bar gnas pa yang ma yin/ dud
277a3: 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams kyi nang du ma yin// lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du ma yin/ klu rnams kyi nang du ma yin/ lha rnams kyi nang du ma yin te/ sman gyi sde byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi
277a4: zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye ba rab tu 'dzin to/ / sman gyi sde phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na gal te sems can la la zhig byang chub tu sems yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur na des yid ma chen po bcas par blta ste/
277a5: brnyas par gnas par gyur kyang sman gyi sde de la des skyo ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya/ zhum par mi bya'o// sman gyi sde ngas chos mang du bstan te/ sman gyi sde ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma zhig/
277a6: gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa spyad kyang sman gyi sde ngas longs spyod kyi phyir ram/ 'tsho ba'i longs spyod kyi phyir ram/ dbang phyug gi longs spyod kyi phyir dka' ba spyod pa spyad pa ma yin gyi/ sman gyi sde chos kyi
277a7: ngo bo nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir ngas dka' ba spyod pa spyad kyang ngas de srid kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob gyi/ / sman gyi sde gang gi tshe gang gi dus na ngas zung gi
277a8: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de nyid kyi nyin mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sman gyi sde chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab bo// chos kyi rnam

277b1: zag 'ad byas pa rnyed byar dgag/ / sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba yang mchog rnyed par dka'o/ sman gyi snganas kyin ma grangs 'ad 'dzin pa dag kyang mchog tu rnyed par dka'// gang da/
277b2: chos kyirnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag thams cad ni bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sman gyi snga bskal pa stong du 'khor bsnyil bar 'gyur ro// sangs
277b3: rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / 'gog pa dang lam yang rab tu shes par 'gyur ro// gnas rab tu shes pa'i bskal pa yod par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i gnas rab tu shes pa'i skal pa ya
277b4: par 'gyur ro/ / mngon par shes pa dang dge ba'i gnas// rab tu shes pa'i skal ba yod par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i gnas dang 'gog pa'i rab tu shes pa'i bskal pa yod par 'gyur ro// sman gyi sde ci'i phyir 'gog pa
277b5: zhes bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gnas ni don zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde chos kyi gnas gang yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos shes bgyi ba ni brtson
277b6: 'grus brtsams pa nyid dang / tshul khrims bsrungs pa nyid dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa lags te/ chos kyi gter zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos kyi gter 'byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
277b7: skal pa/ sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung / bcom
277b8: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde gang dag mang du thos pa dang ldan pa/ rab tu shes pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung ba rab tu shes so// de bzhin gsheg pa rnams kyi 'byung ba

278a1: b+h+ya/ / shes nas de banan gshegs pa rnams kyi 'byung babad pa'i gnas 'dis tu shes so// pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba na sems can rnams kyim chas thams cad btugs
278a2: so/ / thabs mkhas pas chos rnams rab tu shes so// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams rab tu shes so// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes rnams rab tu shes so// /
278a3: gsol pa/ ye shes nyid rtogs nas mya ngan las 'das pa gang rab tu 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde chos rab tu shes nas chos rab tu shes so// sman gyi sde de bzhin du dam pa'i
278a4: chos bsdu ba rab tu shes nas rnyed pa dang po skye'o/ / chos ji ltar thos pa bzhin du bzung nas chos dang ldan pa nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro// sman gyi sde 'di lta ste/ dper na mi tshong bar gyur pa la la zhig mi khur stong
278a5: gi gser khyer te de khe spogs kyi phyir song ba dang / de'i pha ma 'di skad smra ste/ bu nyon cig gser srang stong khyer la gzhan dang rang gi gser legs par khyer cig tsheng ba des gser khyer te song nas zla ba
278a6: g cig tsam lon pa dang gser de dag thams cad chud gsan te med par byas kyi 'og tu de nas mi des bsams pa dang shin du mi dga' ba nas snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug ste de gnod zhing ngo tsha nas rang
278a7: gi khyim du ma song ba dang / de'i pha mas thos nas yi chad de/ snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug nas gos dag kyang dral te bu ngan pa de bdag cag gi khyim du bu'i gzugs su skyes nas khyim so kun kyang bshig/
278a8: ste/ bdag cag la mkho ba med cing sdug bsngal bar byas so// bran gyi las byed du bcug go zhes de skad smra sngags 'don te/ de'i pha ma yi chad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / de nas bu des pha ma bdag la yi chad de

278b1: 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ / zhes thos nas bu de yang yi chad de 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pas don 'di bshad pa la yang gang dag nga'i bstan pa la mi dad pa de dag ni re thag chad nas
278b2: 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug ste 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar pha ma de dag yi chad de gser gyi phyir mya ngan byed cing / snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug nas gzhan dang rang gi gsar
278b3: phyir mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde gang dag nga'i bstan pa lam dad pa de dag ni phyis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe gdung zhing smre sngags 'don la/ sdug bsngar gyi tshor ba byong zhing / sngon las byas pa'i
278b4: bsod nams dag chud zos nas phyin cad zhing bzang po dang ldan pa'i bsod nams dag mi byed de/ de dag gi snying mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pas de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
278b5: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye zhing mi bzang ba drag po mthong nas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'di snyam du sems te/ gang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten mthong bar mi 'gyur
278b6: zhing sdug bsngal gyi tsher bi de myong bar mi 'gyur bar bdag la su zhig skyabs su 'gyur snyam pa dang / de'i pha mas 'di skad ces smras so// bu cig nad kyi 'jigs chen ni/ 'byung bar mi nus ji ltar bya/ nab
278b7: 'chi bas 'jigs mod kyi/ / bu khyod 'chi ba yod ma yin// nad kyis 'jigs dang skrag pa las// khyod ni thar par 'gyur ba yin// bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'gag/ bdag gi lus la rab tu gnod// yan lag
278b8: thams cad sdug bsngal te/ / bdag gis 'tsho ba mthong bar gyur// bdag gi mig ni mi mthong zhing // bdag gi rna yang mi thos so// sna yang thob par mi 'gyur te// lus kyang zo bdog bde ma yin// yan lag nyid lag

279a1: sdug bsngal te/ / shing dang 'dra bas sems pa med// bdag gi 'chi ba 'od med ces// yum gyis bdag gi spro ba srid zad// mas smras pa/ bu khyod de skad smra mi rigs// de la mchog tu 'jigs ma byed
279a2: khyod kyi lus la rims btab pas/ / rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur// bus smras pa/ lus la rims kyang ma mthong ste// na ba med cing sdug bsngal med// 'chi ba shin tu mi bzad mthong // bdag gi lus sdug bcom
279a3: par gyur/ / bdag gi lus kun sdug bsngal gyis// rab tu gzir bar mthong gyur na// su la skyabs su 'gro bar bya// bdag gi skyob par su zhig 'gyur// pha mas smras pa/ khu khyod la// lha yang rab tu bskyon gyur gyis// lha
279a4: rnams la ni mchod byas na/ / de yi 'og tu 'tsho bar gyur// bus smras pa/ gang gis bdag ni 'tsho 'gyur ba// khyod kyis de ltar mdzad du gsol// rings shing rab tu myur bzhud la// lha bon po la 'dri bar bsol// de nas de'i
279a5: pha ma lha'i rten gyi drung du song nas lha la bdugs pa phul ba dang / de nas lha bon pos lha la bdug pa phul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so// khyod la lha bkyon gyis lha rje cig/ mchod sbyin gyis shig/ de la phrugs sod cig/ mi
279a6: yang sod cig dang / de nas khyed kyi bu nad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// de nas pha ma de dag gis bsams pa/ bdag cag ni'i bulan ji ltar bya/ gal te lha ma mnyes na ni bu de yang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/ ji ste
279a7: mnyes par ldan padag cag ni dbul bas ma deng sngags gang nas blad snyam nas de dag riris shing myu bang khyim du dong ste/ / khyim gyi rjes cung zad ci badrog pa de bams cad ldan to ba'i phyir 'tshong dra dong ngo // de nas mi gzhan ni/
279a8: ga nga byed dang kyi sa grangs dag ti gyi na nag tsunas pa tha sa nimigs ma dus ni ma na cing med pa pas ma timis th+ya ga pa na ma

279b1: de khyer te mi nyor dong ngo / / de gnyis kyis mi nyos nas mi des kyang bdag gsad par ni ma shes so// de nas pha ma rmongs par gyur pa de gnyis slar rang gi khyim du mdong gi lha rten gyi drung du song ste/ lha bon po lang
279b2: mer du mchod sbyin mdzod cig ces smras so/ / de nus pa mde gnyis bdag nyid kyis phyugs kyang bsad mi de yang bsad do// de nas lha bon po des mchod sbyin bya bar bas ma ta ma bus pa dang / de nas lnga dab bas te khyod ci
279b3: bu ni des khyer ro zhes smras so/ / de nas pa ma de gnyis dga' zhing mgu bas khyab nas bu 'di so son bdag cag bran du gyur kyang bla zhes smras te/ pha mas lha la mchod sbyin byas nas slar log ste rang gi khyim du phyin nas bu 'chi ba'i//
279b4: dus byas pa mthong ngo // de nas pha ma de gnyis sdug bsngal zhing yi mug pa chen pos snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngu zug ste yi chad par gyur nas de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde mi dge ba'i grogs po dang bsten
279b5: par blta'o/ / gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gang du skye ba zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde kha rog lam 'dri shig gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhu'o// bde bar gshegs pa zhu'o//
279b6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde de la ma ni sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod du skyes so// pha ni sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom du skyes so// bu ni sems can dmyal ba chen po
279b7: bar skyes so/ / lha bon po ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi mnongs pa de gang du skyes// de'i tshe skad ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
279b8: pa/ sman gyi sde de 'di la mi mnyes pa de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis mi de sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang ba

280a1: pa mnyam par skyes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalaM pa/ sman gyi sde nyon cig/ mi de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dad pas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan cig
280a2: sman gyi sde dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa drug bcu'i bar du sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du skye bar tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ skye ba dang skye bar bya
280a3: ngan gyi zug tu thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / skyes ma thag tu sdug bsngal thams cad zlog par byed do// sems can de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi nus so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
280a4: ji ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar rngo thog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// gsolag bcom ldan 'das brtson
280a5: 'grus brtsam pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde nyon cig/ brtson 'grus shes bya ba ni 'bras bu rnams ston pa'o// 'di lta ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni
280a6: brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi gnas so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi gnas so/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'gag/
280a7: pazhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi gnas so// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'i shes pa zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' 'bras bu dang / byang chub kyigs
280a8: zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi gnas te/ sman gyi sde 'di dag ni brtson 'grus kyi gnas shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar bstan par bgyi/

280b1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig gis shing zhig bskyed na de nyid kyi nyin mo shing de'i rtsa bzug nas de nyid kyi nyin mo rtsa ba de'i dpag tshad tsam gyi 'og tu song ngo // mi gzhan zhig gis kyang de bzhin
280b2: du shing bskyed pa dang / de nyid kyi nyin mo rlung gis bskyod de shing de rtsa ba mazug nas/ de nas ma des shing de phyung ba dang / mi gcig shes kyis kyang / ci'i phyir nga'i sa panas shes 'thab 'breg rtsod par gyur nas/ de'i tshe rgyal pos
280b3: gnyis 'thab 'breg rtsod par gyur to/ / zhes thos nas/ rgyal po des po nya btang ste song la mi de gnyis khrid de shog shig/ lha da ltar 'tshal lo zhes mi de rings pa'i gzugs su brgyugs nas mi de gnyis la 'di skad ces khyed
280b4: la rgyal po 'bod do/ / zhes smras pa dang / de nas mi gcig ni 'jigs shing skrag go// mi gcig ni 'jigs shing skrag pa/ med par rgyal po gang la ba der khrid do// srid nas rgyal po'i mdun du 'khod do// de nas rgyal pos mi de gnyis
280b5: la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye khyed ci zhig gi phyir 'thab cing rtsod par gyur/ de nas mi de gnyis langs te rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po gsan du gsol/ bdag cag la ni sa phyogs cung zad kyang ma mchis
280b6: kyis g.yar po zhig la shing bskyed pa las rlung gis bskyod nas rtsa ba yang ma zug lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu yang ma byung ste/ rgyal po chen po de'i rtsa ba dag tshad tsam gyi 'og tu yang mchis pa dang / khyod kyis nyes son/
280b7: mi 'dis bdag la thab mo brgal du bas kyi bdag gis mnongs na lha de la bdag gi cung zad kyang mnongs par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// de nas rgyal po des blon po bye ba phrag sum bcu bkug ste bsogs nas 'di skad ces
280b8: bsgo'o/ / khye cag spros shig/ blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/ ji skad smra bar bgyi/ gang gi nyin mo shing bskyed pa de nyid kyi nyin mo rtsa ba zug nas lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu 'byung ba khyed kyis gang na yang mthong ngam/ thos sam/

281a1: khyed kyis zhag bdun nam zla ba phyed kyis 'di bye brag phyed par gyis shig/ de nas blon po de dag stan las langs te rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal po chen po bdag cag gis 'di bye brag phyed par bgying mi rung ngo // /
281a2: 'di bye brag phyed par rngo ma thog go// rgyal po chen po 'di ni ngo mtshar te/ re shig mi 'di nyid la rma bar bgyi'o// kye skyes bu gang smras pa'i don bden nam smos shig/ smras pa rgyal po chen po don de med do// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi
281a3: nyin mo shing bskyed pa/ de yi nyin mo rtsa ba zug cing // mdab ma me tog 'bras byung zhes// de nyid nyin mo smra ba ni// khyod kyi tshig 'di 'thad par dka'// 'di'ang mthong ba'am thos pa med// de nas mi des thal sbyar te// rgyal po de la
281a4: 'di skad smras/ / gshegs la nyid kyis shing bskyed de// rtsa ba zug la gzigs su gsol// de nas rgyal po dablon po bya ba phrag sum bcu dang lhan cig phyi rol du byung nas mi de gnyis kyang btson rar bcug go// de nas rgyal po
281a5: de nyid kyis shing bskyed pa dang / shing de rtsu ba yang ma zug/ lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu yang ma byung nas/ de nas rgyal po de khros te 'di skad ces khyed myur du deng la shing gshegs pa ste re rnams long shig ces
281a6: smras nas blangs pa dang / de nas gang mi ris bskyed pa'i shing de la khros nas shing de'i lom dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu byung ba rnams bcad de shing gcig po de bcad pa dang shing bcu gnyis byung ngo // shing bcu gnyis
281a7: pa bcad pa'i dang / ngan pan snga bdud kyi gang rtsa ba dang bcas/ lam dang bcas/ mA gA dang bcas pa nyi sa rtsa bzhi byung ngo // de nas ga shun ban pa de dag las b+hagasar gyis bcan// sar gyis na/
281a8: ngan po che sna bdun gyi mdapa me can te shu rtsa bani zung ngo // de nas rgyal po de the ba'i bram gyis nan nam ngag leg gis star blangs te/ shing de la gcabs pa dang / shing gakhas pa de las bdud rtsi'i gro thung

281b1: de nas rgyal po de yid mo bde nas seng la mi de gnyis btson ra nas phyung shig ces bsgo ba dang / lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes de'i mod la rab tu brgyugs te/ pi de gnyis btson das pUng nas shing gal ba der khrid pa dang /
281b2: pos sbas pa/ shing gcig bcad pa gnyis gyur tu 'phel te nyi shu rtsa bzhir gyur pa de khyed kyis bskyed dam// ngas bskyed pa'i shing ni rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu yang ma skyes so// de nas mi des gsol pa/
281b3: chen po bdag gi bsod na pas ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i bsod nams khyed la mi mnga'o// de nas blon po bye ba phrag sum bcus pus mo'i lhang gnyis sa la btsugs nas me de la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po snga ma 'ad ni pa
281b4: gis khyed kyis rgyal po ba dgos so/ / de nas mi des blon po de dag la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal po longs spyod bdag mi dgos// nor dang 'bru yang dgos pa med// sangs rgyas rnams la bdag dang bas//
281b5: rkang gnyis dag gi me tog tu sheg/ zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings// gang na de bzhin gshegs par 'gro/ mya ngan 'das khyim 'gro 'gyur ba// chos 'di khyed la bshad par bya// dkyil mo dgrang ni bcas nas su// de nas ya
281b6: dam rab bcas so/ / bdag gis sngon byas las rnams kyis// rgyal po'i becen rang phyin par 'gyur// smon lam 'di ni btab pas na/ bdag gi las na zad par gyur// de nas bya bye ba phrag nya shu rtsa bzhis rdo rje'i mchus sil
281b7: snyan rnams dkrol to/ / de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na khang pa brtsegs pa sum khri nyas stong byung ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga bar gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa re re las kyang bya gser gyi za ba can
281b8: gsar gyi macu can gser gyi gdong can bye ba phrag nyi shu lnga lnga byung ste/ de dag gis mi'i skad du smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyis legs pa byas// khyod kyis shing de bcad pas na/ bye ba brgya yi shing rnams las// nyi shu

282a1: bzhir gnas par gyur/ / sems can gang gis shing bskyed 'di// ci 'dra shes pa ma yin pa// sdig pa'i las kyis byin na kyi/ mi sdug 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur// rgyal pos smras pa// bdag gis don 'di mag/
282a2: kyis// dka' thub chen po lung ston cig/ bya rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di ni 'jig rten snang byed de// rnam par 'dren par 'gyur ba yin// 'khor ba'i srid pa'i btson ra las// sems can thams cad thar byed pa'o// rgyal pos
282a3: smras pa/ gang gi shing ni ma skyes pa// skyes bu gnyis pa de gang yin// des ni sdig pa'i las gang byas// gnyis skyes rnams ni smra bar byos// bya rnams kyis smras pa// gang gi shing ni ma skyes pa// de ni lha byin glen pa ste//
282a4: dge ba cung zad ma byas na// de yi shing ni ji ltar skyes// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na blon po bye ba phrag sum bcu po rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas thams cad sa bcu la rab tu gnas te mngon par shes pa so
282a5: sor thob par gyur to/ / rgyal po de yang sa bcu la gnas nas dge ba'i chos mngon par rtogs pa rjes su thob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces
282a6: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis blon po bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa gsum po rnams sa bcu la gnas te mngon par shes pa so sor thob par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman
282a7: gyi sde nyon cig dang lung bstan par bya'o/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa 'dzad do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog brgya stong phrag du ma 'di lta
282a8: ste/ / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'tha' yas bu med pa snang bar byas te slar

282b1: log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa
282b2: gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gas
282b3: ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
282b4: pa/ sman gyi sde phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skye bo'i tshogs de'i gan du 'ong ba mthong ngam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dem mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde de'i phyir skye
282b5: ze'i tshigs la rnam par rtogs te ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes rnam par bltas pa dang / shar phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas/ de'i phyogs
282b6: gcig na skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ mi dag mi smra/ mi zer/ mi brjod/ mi za/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / lho phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas de
282b7: la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi smra/ kun du mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / nub phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun sto/
282b8: bcig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs stong phrag nyi shurtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi smra kun du mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldar/ mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / byang phyogs nas shing dpag tshad

283a1: bdun stong pa cig byung nas/ de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi smra// kun du mi smra// yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang / 'og gi phyiH
283a2: nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ mi smra/ kun du mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang / mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang /
283a3: steng gi phyogs nas shing dpag tshad bdun stong pa cig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'dus te/ de dag kyang mi zer/ ma s+sa/ kun du mi smra/ yongs su mi brjod/ mi ldang/ mi 'chag ste/ cang mi smra
283a4: bar 'khod pa mthong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das
283a5: kyis bdag la skabs byen/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
283a6: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sman gyi sde ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyis sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka'
283a7: stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sngas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten nas skye bo'i tshogs mang po lhags shang
283a8: gnas pa nas 'og dang steng phyogs kyi bar nas skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag lnga bcu lhags shing gnas par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde khyod sod/

283b1: la'adi dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas lhags pa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la khyod nyid kyis zhus shig/ gsol pa/ su rje 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas mchi bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi/
283b2: sderang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed par song shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi
283b3: khams bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba can gyi zhing zhes bya ba byang chub sems
283b4: dpa' bye ba stong phrag brgyad bcus yongs su bskor cing bdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
283b5: gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing de'i spyan sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang gis mi mjed kyi 'jig
283b6: rten gyi khams su shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar skye ba'i tshogs phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing lhags pa dag de na mchis pa'i tshe ni mthong la 'di na mchis pa'i tshe ma mthong bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
283b7: bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde de nyid na rgyu zhing gnas so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ji lta bu lags// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing gal
283b8: kha der song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'das te mchis pa na bcom/

284a1: ldan 'das bdag gis de dag tu sems can ji snyed mthong ba de snyed ni gang na yang ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can de dag ni sems pa med pa'i shing las byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom
284a2: ldan 'das gang sems pa ma mchis pa'i shing las mi byung ba sus mthong sus zos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde gang sems pa med pa'i shing las me 'byung ba khyod kyis ma mthong ma thos sam/
284a3: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ma mthong ma thos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde khyod mthong bar 'dod na de nges bstan par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs
284a4: pa 'tshal lo/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing nas phyag brkyang ba dang / phyag de las skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag brgya byung ste/ skye ba'i tshogs re res kyang lag pa brgya brgya brkyang nas spos dang / phreng ba dang / thug pa sna tsam
284a5: de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la spos dang / phreng ba dang / thug pa gtor ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
284a6: mthong lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye bo'i tshogs byung ba 'di dag sems pa med pa'o// mi 'di dag ni sems pa med pa'o// de nas bye ba stong phrag brgya po de dag
284a7: re nang yang gang lag pa brgyabargya yod pa de dag thams cad ltung ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di tsa zhig
284a8: lags/ bang bar gshegs pa 'ang ci zhig lags/ gang mi rnams kyi lag pa brgya po yang yud tsam gyis lhung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gal te lag pa brgya pa yang grol bar mi 'gyur na lag pa gnyis pa'i mi lta spos kyang

284b1: 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde de bzhin du sems can rnams ni sems pa med par skye'o// sems pa med par 'gag go// sman gyi sde de'i lus kyang sems pa med par gyur par shes par bya'o//
284b2: gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das gang sems can de dag la gzhan pa gang lags/ rgan pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyis sems can gzhan pa yang yong/ rgan pa yang yod do// sol pa/ tsa
284b3: ldan 'das gzhon pa gang lags/ rgan pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag da ltar ltung ba de dag ni rgan pa'o// gang dag shing rnams las skyes pa de dag ni gzhon pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'am/
284b4: sems can gzhon nu rnams mthong bar 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba can gyi zhing gis phyag g.yas pa'i 'thil brkyang ba dang / de nas phyogs nas skye bo'i tshogs bye ba stong phrag brgya brgya'ong ngo // 'og dang steng
284b5: phyogs nas skye bo'i tshogs bye ba phrag lnga bcu 'ong ste/ skye bo'i tshogs de dag lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mi sma/ kun mi smra zhing cang mazer bar
284b6: 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mi smra// kun mi sma ni
284b7: cang ma mchi bar mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde khyod mi shes sam/ sa phyogs ni sems pa med de mi smra/ kun mi smra zhing chos kyi phung po yang mi shes so// deci'i byor zhe na/ sman gyi
284b8: 'di la sems can gzhon nu kha cig ni mthong yang skye ba mi shes/ 'gag pa dang / rga ba dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / mdza' ba dang bye ba dang / 'chi

285a1: ba dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sdug bsngal mi bzed pa de dag thams cad mi shes te/ mthong yang yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur na shes par lta ga la 'gyur te/ sman gyi sde de dag yang dang yang bslab par bya'o//
285a2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang chos ma 'tshal ba'i sems can gzhon nu de dag gang nas mchis// gang nas
285a3: 'chi 'pho zhing gang du skye bar 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde nyon cig/ mi'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa de dag na dngul mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/ zangs mkhan gyis kyang ma byas/ shing mkhan
285a4: gyis kyang ma byas/ rdza mkhan gyis kyang ma byas te/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pas kyang ma byas kyi/ gzhan du na skyes pa dang bud med 'dus pa dang / sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa las byung ngo // sems can de dag kyang yang dang yang bzo'i las
285a5: rnams slob pas de dag gi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshor ba mi bzad pa 'byung ste// der de dag sngon sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas pa'i rnam par smin pa myong ngo // sman gyi sde 'di nyid du gang sems can
285a6: gzhon nu lhags pa mi ldang ba 'di dag ni 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tsher ba myong bar 'gyur te/ sman gyi sde de'i phyir mi smra// kun mi smra'o// sman gyi sde de ltar na sems can gzhon nu de dag ni dge ba'i yang mi shes// skye
285a7: ba yang mi shes/ 'gag pa yang mi shes te/ de dag mi lus kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur ba 'di dag kyang sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gzhon nu rnams ji ltar skye/
285a8: ji ltar 'gag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig gis me la shing gis reg par byas pa dang / shing de la mthar gyis me 'bar ba de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde thog ma mi'i lus su skye'o//

285b1: skyes nas gdod tshor ba myong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das su zhig 'dir mngon par skyed/ skyes nas su zhig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sangs rgyas nyid skyes so// de
285b2: bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / 'di lta ste dper no// rgyal pos mi la la zhig bcings te khang pa mun pa mun nag gi nang du btson rar bcug pa dang / mi de khang pa mun nag der zhugs
285b3: nas khang pa mun nag la khang pa mun nag du mthong ngo / / de nas mi gzhan sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas reg pa zhig gis mthong nas mi de ni ma rung bar gyur to// sngan sdug bsngal ma myong bas 'tsho ba srog chad par 'gyur
285b4: ro/ / snyam bsams nas des der me khyer te 'ongs nas khyim de'i nang du ma chung zad cig bor ba dang / mi btson rar bcug pa des mi de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de dbugs phyin par gyur te spro ba skyes so// me da
285b5: yang rgyu gang gis 'bar ba'i ma 'bar ba des khyim de kun du 'bar bar gyur nas mi de yang de nyid du tshig pa dang / de tshig go zhes rgyal pos thos nas mi dga' ste/ de 'di snyam du phyin cad ni bdag gi yul
285b6: du sems can gang yang btson rar mi bzhug go snyam du sems so/ / de nas rgyal po des rang gi yul na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la/ kye sems can khyed cag ma 'jigs shig/ ma skrag shig / byed
285b7: cag 'jigs par ma gyur cig/ phyin chad nga'i yul du chad pas gcad pa 'am/ btson rar gzhug par mi bya'o// sems can gang yang srog dang 'bral bar mi bya/ kye sems can byed rnams ma 'jigs
285b8: shig ces de ltar dbugs phyung ba de bzhin du/ sman gyi sde de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba'o// ji ltar khyim tshig nas mi nyid kyi lus kyang

286a1: tshig ste/ sems can rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs nas sems can bcings pa yang bcings pa las yongs su thar par byed pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang
286a2: dang / gti mug ga dri ma spangs te/ sems can thams cad la sgron ma bzhin du 'jig rten du byung nas sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin gyi lus rnams las yongs sutha
286a3: par mdzad cing sems can gzhon nu dang rgan po rnams kyang yongs su thar bar mdzad do/ / de nas steng gi bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // rgyal ba'i zhing ni ngo mtshar zhing / zhing bzang mngon par 'dus byas pa/
286a4: de la sa bon btab pa ni/ rnam par chud zar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal ba'i zhing ni dag pa'i zhing // sangs rgyas bstan pa bsngags pa ste/ sems can thams cad bzung ba'i phyir// ston pas kyang ni thabs mdzad do// mya ngan 'das
286a5: ba'i dbyings gnas kyang / / sa yi steng na kun du snang // rtag tu 'jig rten zhi byas nas// sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas rnams spyod// sems can gzhon nu thar bar byed// rgan po rnams kyang thar par byed// sems can thams cad
286a6: khams gsum las/ / mthar gyis yongs su thar par byas// sems can dmyal ba'i sgo bcad de// dud 'gro yi dgas thar bar byas// 'jig rten 'di yang zhi byas nas// 'jig rten pha rol bde bar byed// de nas bcom ldan
286a7: 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ legs pa rnams ni mthong na legs// sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong na legs// dam chos yon tan zhing yang legs// dge 'dun 'dus pa mthong na legs// zung bstan
286a8: pa yang legs pa ste/ / sdig pa rnam par 'jig pa legs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dig

286b1: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags// rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can gzhon nu 'di dag mtheng ngam/ gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong la
286b2: so/ / bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde 'di dag thams cad ni deng nyid dus bcul rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman
286b3: sde dpag tshad brgyad bri srid kyi steng gi nam mkha' la gnas pa dang / lha bye ba stong phrag brgyad bcu bcom ldan 'das la me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs so// sems can gzhon nu de dag kyang thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo//
286b4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes par snang la gnas bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sbas gang bar gyur pa dang / sems can dmyalab
286b5: chen po sam bcu rtsa gnyis su skyes pa'i sems can rnams sgra de nyan to/ / lha'i ris sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyang bde mnyan to// stod gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// rgya mtsho chen
286b6: po'i nang gi klu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang 'khrugs so/ / srin po bye ba stong phrag sum bcu yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir lcags so// yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga yang lcang lo can gyi pho brang
286b7: nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus pa chen po kun du gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gzhon nu de dag la chos bstan pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas byang chub sems
286b8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba stong phrag brgya rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags so/ / / bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan

287a1: 'das gal ba de lags su thal ma sbar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di sad ces gsal to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'dus shing mchis pa mang / de bar gshegs pa dang / bcom
287a2: ldan 'das lha dang klu 'dus shing mchis pa yang mang ngo / / srin po ze ba phrag du ma zhig kyang lcang lo can gyi po brang 'khor nas lhags te 'dus nas mchis par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
287a3: dpa' chen po sman gyi sngal bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mar shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis steng nas babs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo /
287a4: ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi phung po chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi ga bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
287a5: pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba ni gang tshangs par spyod pa yongs su tshol zhing gang tshangs par spyod pa yongs su btsal nas kyang sdig pa thams cad spod pa'o// rigs kyi bu sems can gnon nu mi tshangs par/
287a6: spyod pa spangs nas gdon mi za bar gzungs rab tu 'thob par 'gyur zhing chos thams cad dang yang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis sems can mang po zhig 'dus
287a7: shi sa kyi thang ma nyi/ de nas bcom ldan las kyis byung chu mams dpa' sems dpa' chen po can gyi rnal bka sprul pa/ sa ga dag skye banyid sdug bsngal du'i nyas da sngag pas nga
287a8: nyan nad nyid sdug bsngal dang / mya ngan sdug bsngal dang / smre sngags 'don pa sdug bsngal dang / sdug pa dang bral ba sdug bsngal dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa sdug bsngal du minyan pa'i sems can yang phal cha

287b1: yod do/ / 'chi ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyi phyir lus dang srog 'phrog pa yin te/ sman gyi sde 'di ni sdug bsngal thams cad ces bya'o// de nas sems can gzhon nu de dag gis bstan pa'idi thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das
287b2: gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'gum par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed dang sems
287b3: can thams cad kyang mchi'o/ / de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'chi ba'i dus kyis non par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'chi ba'i dus na rnam par shes pa 'gag par
287b4: byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang / rnam par shes pa 'khrul par byed zhes bya ba'i rlung dang / rnam par shes pa 'khrugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang / rigs kyi bu rlung gsum po 'di dag gis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes
287b5: pa tha ma la klod par 'gyur/ 'khrul bar 'gyur/ 'khrugs pa skyed par 'gyur ro// de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa 'gag pa na lus 'jom par bgyid pa'i rlung gsum po gang
287b6: lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag mtshon zhes bya ba dang / skul ba zhes bya ba dang / ze ba zhes bya bas lus 'jom par byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus shes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags
287b7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag kun du 'bar ba zhes kyang bya/ tshig pa zhes kyang bya/ dang snabs zhes kyang bya// sbags pa zhes kyang bya/ dur khrod pa zhes kyang bya/ ngan pa'i blo zhes kyang bya/ khar li ba zhes
287b8: kyang bya skyabs yongs su gzir ba zhes kyang bya/ skye bas kun du dkrugs pa zhes kyang bya/ srog yongs su gdung ba zhes kyang bya/ 'chi ba dang sdug pa dang bral bar byed pa zhes kyang bya ste/ thogs po dag 'di rnams ni la

288a1: shes bya'o/ / de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'gum/ ji ltar 'tsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa bsod nams shes
288a2: ba ni 'tsho ba'o/ / grogs po dag lus shes bya ba ni 'chi ba ste/ rgyus pa bye bas ni bkris/ spu'i khung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang ni ldan// yan lag khri nyis stong gis ni spel/ rus pa sum brgya drug bcus ni bstan/ lus kyi nang na srin bu'i rags/
288a3: brgya bcu rtsa bzhi ni gnas te/ srog chags de dag thams cad la yang 'chi ba yang yod/ 'chi ba 'gag pa yang yod do// nam mid 'chi ba den srog chags de dag thams cad re thag chad par 'gyur te/ de na srog chags thams cad
288a4: gcig la gcig zabs rlung 'khrug cing g.yo bar 'gyur te/ de na de dag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo // la la ni bu'i phyir mya ngan byed/ la la ni bu mo'i phyir mya ngan byed/ la la ni gnyen gyi phyir mya ngan byed de/ de dag thams
288a5: cad mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug go/ / gcig la gcig za bar brtsams nas de dag gcig gis gcig zos te srog chags gnyis shig las pa na de gnyis kyang zhag bdun gyi bar du 'thabs te zhag bdun 'das pa dang /
288a6: srog chags gcig ni bcom so// gcig ni thar to// tshe dang ldan pa chos shes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar srog chags rnams gcig la gcig mi mthun par byas nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de shi/
288a7: du byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sems can rnams kyang gcig la gcig mi mthun pa byed de skye bas mi 'jigs/ rga bas mi 'jigs/ nad kyis mi 'jigs/ 'chi bas mi 'jigs/ ji ltar srog chags gnyis 'thab
288a8: po bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang phan tshun 'thab bo/ / de nas 'chi ba'i dus na skyes bu dge ba rnams kyis smras pa/ skyes bu khyod ci zhig la yid ston khyod kyis nyes pa cung zad kyang ma mthong

288b1: ngam/ skye ba'i nyes pa ma mthong dam/ rgan pa dang na ba'i nyes pa ma mthong dam/ 'chi ba'i nyes pa ma mthong dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis skye ba'i nyes pa yang mthong ngo // rga ba dang na ba'i nyes pa yang mthong
288b2: ngo/ thams cad kyi tha mar 'chi ba'i nyes pa yang mthong ngo // smras pa/ ci'i phyir gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bya ba ma byas/ ci'i phyir 'jig rten gnyis gar bde ba 'phel ba'i chos kyi phung po dge ba'i rtsa ba
288b3: rnams ma byas/ grogs po dag gnyis su yang dri'o// khyod ci'i phyir gang skye ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su thar pa'i dge ba'i tshogs ma byas/ khyod kyi ci'i phyir tshul bzhin yid la byed pa so sor brtag pa
288b4: ma byas/ ji ltar khyed kyis sa la 'gan de rdung pa'i sgra ma thos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing la dge ba'i sa bon spun cing spos sam/ phreng ba 'am/ mar me sbyin pa byin pa ma mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa la
288b5: bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'bul ba dang / 'khor bzhi tshim par byas pa yang ma mthong / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de dag ni 'khor bzhi'o//
288b6: ltar de la phan pa'i phyir smras te bsnyad pa dang / lha cung zad kyang ma bgyis so// mi khyod kyis ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs nas mi dge ba byas so// de'i tshe mi shi ba de la chos kyi rgyal pos rjes su
288b7: bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung mthong zhing // 2kan 'di rdung ba thob gyur la// mya ngan 'das pa zhir 'gro ba'i// chos bstan thos kyang ma byas so// den
288b8: mi des slar smras pa/ bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song nas// 'dod pa'i 'khrul ba'i sems kyis su// bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas so// 'dod pa dag kyang

289a1: bsten pa dang / bdag gis srog chags rnams kying bsad// dge 'dun rnams kyang chud gsan pas// mi bzad de'i 'bras bu'o// gnod par sems pa'i yid kyis su// bdag gis mchod rten gshig pa byas/
289a2: tshig don rnams kya rab tu smras// bdag gi ma yang gdung bar byas// bdag gi lus kyis gang byas pa/ nyes pa dag kyang rab tu shes// sems dmyal chen po du 'bod du// shin tu mi bzad skyeb mthong // bsdus gzhom du yang
289a3: tsher ba myong / / de bzhin rab tu tsha ba dang // mnar med chen po mi bzad par// tsher ba rjes su myong bar 'gyur// pad ma lta bur cher gas pa'i// sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal du// thig nag btab pa 'jigs chen du// lan
289a4: brgya bar du skye bar 'gyur/ / sems dmyal sems can bsad nas su// phyis kyang 'jigs pa de mthong ste// dpag tshad brgyar ni yang dang yang // 'jigs pa chen por ltung bar 'gyur// de dag sgo rnyed mi 'gyur te// byis
289a5: kyang mun par rab tu ltung / / spu gri zhes bya sems dmyal du// spu gri stong yang 'byung bar 'gyur// bya ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyi// spu gri mdun du 'byung 'gyur te// bdag gis nyes pa'i las byas pas// de dag gis ni de lus
289a6: gtubs/ / rlung 'khrugs chen po mi bzad pas// lus de thams cad 'jig par byed// rtag tu 'di 'dra'i sems dmyal du// bdag gis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// lus ni rab tu sdug bsngal bar// sems can kun gyis bdag
289a7: mthong ngo / / khyim mo bya phyir gzhan dag gi/ nor yang rab tu bdag gis blangs// bdag gi bu po bu mo dang // de bzhin phran sring mo dang // bdag gi pha ma'ang de bzhin te// mdza' bo gnyen gshas mang po dang // bran dang las byed
289a8: rnams dang ni/ / de bzhin pa dang phyugs dang g.yog/ dgos pa ngan la bdag 'khrul te// gser dang dngul gyi snod rnams dang // de bzhin rab pra gos rnams dang // khyim byed pa cug pas 'khyal ba ste// khyim yang shin tu

289b1: bkra byas nas/ / skyes pa bud med lang long dang // bi bang sil snyan 'khrol ba la// bdag yid mdul dga' bar gyur// spos chu dag gis lus bkrus kyang // da dung byas pa gzo ba med// lus khyod sems pa med pa ste// nga ni khyod kyi
289b2: ched la 'khrul/ / phyin chad sems can 'ga' tsam yang // bdag la skyob par 'gyur ba med// rlung 'khrug chen po mi bzad par// lus ni yongs su gdung ba na// ro dang ldan pa zhim zos te// lces kyang sna tshegs de bzhin no// phreng
289b3: bsna tshogs bzang mdzes pa/ / rab tu mang po mgo la bcings// mig ni gzugs kyis 'khrul byas te// mig gi skyabs ni yod ma yin// bdag gis mthong nas gang byas pa// sdig pa'i rnams ni mig gi rgyu// lag pa
289b4: rdo rjes bcad pa ni/ / bdag gi rna ba'i rgyu yin no// lag pa gnyis la gdu bu btags// sor mo rnams la sor gdub bcug/ mgul du mu tig se mo do// rkang pa gnyis kyang rab tu brgyan// de la dra ba byas pa dang // de la gser yang
289b5: gnas par byas/ / lus la rin chen sna tshogs dang / gser gyi gdu bu'ang de bzhin no// longs spyod chen pos rabartses nas// yid kyang shin du rtas par gyur// rab tu 'jam la bdag reg nas// shin du sred pas de bstan to//
289b6: gding ba sna tshogs mal cha yis/ bdag gis lus ni rtser bcug go// spos chu bzang pos khrus byas te// spos rnaMs kyis kyang rab tu skus// lha rdzas ga bur tsan dan gyi// bdug pa rnams kyis rab tu bdugs// kha dog bzang
289b7: bo byas nas kyang / / gla rtsi ldan pas rab tu bsgos// lo lon 'bru mar dri dag dang // sna ma tsam pa ka las sogs// bskus nas pra mo ka shi ka/ dkar po'i gos kyang rab tu bgos// glang po'i rgyab nas babs nas su// ta ye rgyab tu
289b8: mngon par zhon/ / bdag ni rgyal po yin snyam sems// skye bo bdag gi mdun na rgyug/ glu gar shin tu bslabs pa yi// sras rnams kyang ni rab tu shes// ri dgas rnams ni mnyes par// bdag gi mangs kyang ri dgas

290a1: gsang / 'jig rten phyi ma pa shes pas// bdag gis 'di 'bra'i sdig byas shing // bdag gis gzhan gyi sha zos pas// de phyir bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di// mi bzad 'ong bar 'gyur ba yi// 'chi ba bdag gis mi shes te/
290a2: bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur pas// bdag gi lus kyang gso ba byas// deng ni bdag la 'chi 'ong na// skyabs byed pa ni su yang med// gnyen rnams khyed cag thams cad kyang / nga yi gdong du bltar ci yod// ci zhig phyir/
290a3: ni gos 'dral zhing // ci phyir ngu zhing smre sngags 'don// ci phyir sgra rnams rab 'jig cing // ci phyir khrag kyang 'byin par byed// ci phyir mgo la rdul 'thor zhing // zang yang rab tu rdung bar byed// bdag gson chen sdig pa
290a4: rnams/ / spang bar bya rigs khyed ci mdud// bdag gi lus ni spyang gi dang / khyi dang bya rog rnams dang ni// bya rnams kyis kyang bza' bar 'gyur// lus 'di dgos pa med par gsos// 'chi ba'i sprul dang ldan gyur nas//
290a5: mi ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa 'di las grol 'gyur ba// de lta bu yi sman rnams bsnyen// bdag la sman pas gang byin pa'i// sman de dgos pa ma yin na// nyon mongs sprul las thar byed pa// da ltar tshes
290a6: kyi sman rnams ni/ / 'chi kar bdag la sbyin par byos// sha ni de la ma sbyin cig/ lus 'di gso ba byas kyang ni// gdon mi za bar 'jig par 'gyur// gang phyir sdug bsngal sbyin gyur pa// sdig gi phung po ci phyir blangs//
290a7: lus 'di shin tu gsos byas kyang // byas pa ma rung byed par 'gyur// bu dang bu mo ci zhig phyir// ngal mig gis lta bar byed// na ba 'di las da skyobs shig/ don med par ni ci phyir du// bu dang bu mo byed cag /
290a8: de ni ma rung ma byed cig/ khyed cag gso bar bya ba'i phyir// des ni gzhan gyi nor yang phrogs// de ni 'chi dus bab pa na// de thag chad kyis ci zhig byed// skye dang ngan 'gros rab tu 'jigs// 'chibs kyang ni ya

290b1: su gzir/ tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang // reg pa shin du tshor ba'o// sred pas byis pa rnam kyang 'byam// mi bzad 'bras bu rnams kyang thob// ngan pa'i rigs su skye ba ni// der yang mya ngan bcings par 'gyur// bdag la bsod
290b2: nams chung shes nas/ / skye bo gzhan dag mya ngan byed// sbyin dang tshul khrims yongs su nyams// chos la yang ni rgyab kyis phyogs// yang skye ba ni mi shes pas// nyon mongs sbrul gyis nyon mongs gas rig pas ni byis pa rnams//
290b3: gang na thar pa med par 'bya// thar pa'i don ni mi shes nas// 'khrul pas sdig pa rnams kyang byed// nyon mongs rnams kyis byis pa 'khyam// yid ni rtag tu rnam par 'khrugs// bcing ba sna tshogs ldan lus la// mes ni kun du 'bar shing
290b4: tshig/ gang na bde ba med pa der// lus ni rnam par 'khrul pas 'byam// gang las shin du bde 'byung ba// bde ba de ni mi shes te// sangs rgyas zhing ni bde ba sbyin// chos kyi 'khor lo sman gyi mchog/ tshul khrims bden pa'i tshul khrims so//
290b5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshangs dbyangs yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sems can dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe// de ltar smre sngags 'don
290b6: kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par de dag gi skyob par 'gyur ba sa yang med do zhes bka' de skad stsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsungs so/ / sdig pa'i las ni byis pas na/ semra
290b7: can dmyal ba rnams su ltung / / sreg pa'i gos ni gyon par 'gyur// skam du lcags khu 'thung bar 'gyur// lus rnams la ni me mdaga' bab// tshig nas rab tu mi bzad du// sems can dmyal ba 'jigs chen du// de yi
290b8: lus ni rab tu 'tshig/ bde ba dag ni mi shes shing // chos kyang rnam par mi shes te// chos ma yin pas byis pa 'byam// bde ba ba cung zad rnyed mi 'gyur// dad dang tshul brims phun sum tshogs// shes rab ldan zhing dka' grub

291a1: che/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan pa ni// de bzhin gshegs par myur du 'gyur// 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i phyir// brtson 'grus kyi ni mchog rtsoms la// sems can thams cad yongs su bzung ba// dge ba'i las
291a2: gyis chos ston cig/ byams pa'i sems dang de bzhin du// tshangs spyad mchog la snyoms par zhugs// sman sde de skad thos nas kyang // mchog tu bsgrub par 'gyur bar bya// rnam grol mthong dang sangs rgyas dang / sgrub sgrags rnam
291a3: par 'dren pa dang / 'jig rten gyi ni pha ma dang // de ni byang chub sems shes bya// 'jig rten du ni chos 'di gang ston pa// dge ba'i gshes gnyen mchog tu rab rnyed dkal/ sangs rgyas bstan la gang dag gus nyan pa// de dag bla ma//
291a4: sangs rgyas bde gshegs 'gyur// zhi ba sangs rgyas sras rnams la// gang dag gus dang bcas 'gyur ba// de dag kyang ni sems can kun// thar byed 'jig rten mgon du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sem
291a5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du dogs 'di g.yo rab tu g.yo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
291a6: po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sman gyi sde ci mthong bltos// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bltas pa dang phyogs bzhi na sa gas pa mthong ngo // sogs pas sogs pa'i phrag
291a7: nam mi bye ba phrag nyi shu zung ba dang / 'ogag phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba dang // seng gi phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa wa byung ba mthong ngo // de nas sems can gzhon nu de dag gis rnam par bltas nas
291a8: ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'dir su dag skyes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag la ltos/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//

291b1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ za chags 'did dgan kyad la bang pa'i gyur byas so// gas la pa/ sems can 'di dag kyang 'gram par 'gyur dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gzugs pa dag dpa'
291b2: te/ sems can thams cad kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas sems can gzhon nu snga ma gang dag thog ma nyid du skyes pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'a
291b3: la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag nam yang skye ba dang 'gum pa la lta bar mi spro'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na brtson 'grus kyi stobs rnyed par spro'am// de dag gis gsol pa/ de
291b4: bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du blta bar bgyi'o/ / de nas chos gang mnyan pa zhus te yid du 'ong ba mnyan par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'dus pa la blta bar bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa'
291b5: rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams la blta bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu la spro'i skye ba dang mgum pa la ni lta bar mi spro'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis
291b6: byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag dang lhag cig tu stan las langs nas de dag thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang la 'gro zhing dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas bsam gtan byed de/ de dag thams cad kyi lus las
291b7: seng ge rnams zung ngo / / stag rnams byung ngo // sbrul rnams byung ngo // glang po rnams byung ngo // rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par 'phrul pa ston to// ri la yang dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// stang du dpag rad nyi wa srid du/
291b8: 'gro'o// zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba stong phrag bcu yang 'bab par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems can gzhon nu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od zer chen po gda' ba dang /

292a1: rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed zla ba dang / nyi ma byung ba 'di la ltos/ de dag
292a2: gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lus las 'od zer snang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
292a3: dang / cho 'phrul bsten pa ste bstan nas kyang skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshigs chen po dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i
292a4: phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag 'dir mi'i lus dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus bstan nas 'di 'dra ba'i stobs nye bar ston to// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'od zer snang ba 'byung bar bgyi ba'i slad
292a5: du chos bstan du gsol/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sman gyi sde khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po
292a6: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa mthong ngam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// des 'di snyam bsams te/ gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs
292a7: pa la don de zhu'o/ / snyam bsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// bstan par
292a8: bya'o/ / rnam par dbye bar bya'o// sman gyi sde gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams kyi de thams cad bstan par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das the tsom bsal ba'i slad du bstan du gsol/

292b1: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i bu stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis bskor ba dang / klu'i rgyal po bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis
292b2: kyis bskor ba dang / 'byung po bye ba stong phrag bcwa brgyad kyis bskor ba dang / yi dgas dang sha za bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas bskor ba mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sems
292b3: can 'di dag ni chos nyan pa'i phyir 'khor 'dir nga'i gan du 'dus shing 'khod gor ma chag ste/ sman gyi sde 'di dag ni deng kho nar 'khod pa bsnyil bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams can la phan pa dang 'dod pas dang
292b4: nyid ma bcu rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / sa bcu la rab tu gnas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro// na dang 'chi las thar bya'i phyir// las byas bde ba thob byed cing // nyon mongs nas
292b5: pa pham byas nas/ / sangs rgyas bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi gnas mang po las sna tshogs kyis byung ba'i 'di ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la bskor cing gnas/
292b6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde nyon cig/ sems can rmongs pa mi shes pa// thar par 'gyur ba ga la yod// sems can gzhon nu mang po dag/ de ring gzugs rnams thob par 'gyur// sa
292b7: bcu dag ni 'thob pa'i phyir/ / chos kun rab tu shes par 'gyur// sa bcu dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas bya ba byed par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// chos char rab tu 'bebs par
292b8: 'gyur/ de ltar sems can 'dus pas na// da yi bstan pa dga' ba'o// lha dang kla dang yi dgas dang // lha min shin tu mi bzang ba/ sa bcu la ni rab gnas te// chos kyi sgo yang sgrogs par 'gyur// chos kyi rnga yang

293a1: rdung bar 'gyurachos kyi drang yang rab tu 'brang/ / sems can gzhon nu 'di dag kyang brtson 'grus mthu dang ldan par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pas thos pa bzhin// de dag deng ni chos thob 'gyur// de nas
293a2: sems can gzhon nu lnga stong tsam stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang phyir mtha' ni ma 'tshal ba// 'khor ba nan
293a3: 'chi ba ste/ / lus ni khur lci bcom ldan 'das// 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa// lam ni rnam par ma 'tshal te// lam nyid kyang ni mi gda' bas// mgon po bdag cag ljongs gyur na// bdag cag rnams ni bsdu bar gso
293a4: dpa' la bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal/ / 'dren pas chos ni bshad du gsol// bdag cag shes rab chu ngur skyes// bde ba mngon par ma 'tshal to// bdag cag la ni chos bshad gsol// sdug bsngal mi bzad grol bar
293a5: mdzod/ gang dang gang du skyes par yang // bdag cag sangs rgyas mthong gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad
293a6: ces smras so/ / khyed cagarnams ni zas thogs/ rbang du byung ba'i ro yang mthung // jigs pa med par byur nas su// byis gdang 'jigs med kyis nyon cig rdzas ga btsun pa gnas gan khyod du ga/ dag cag
293a7: kyis gyid pa shes/ khyod/ rab tu mdzes par mthod// gzugs ni 'i/ grags pa'o// mi dgas 'jig rten 'dags can dang / sems dpa' dun 'thon pasams pang/ ji sar tho ma sa
293a8: ba thams cad ni/ / khyod kyi lag na nod yod pa// rin chen sna bdun ldan pa dang // lus la rin chen srang tha dang / gzi brjid phrang pos brgyan pa mthong // bakhyod kyis tshig smras pa// bdag cag lan rnaMmam kyi

293b1: bdag cag ni zas rnams dang / / zhim po'i skom yang mi dgos te// zas las bshad pa 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin skem yang gcin du 'gyur// khu ba rnams las khrag tu 'gyur// de bzhin khrag las shar 'gyur bas
293b2: zas dang skom rab sbyar ba yang / / bdag cag rnams la dgos ma yin// dar dang snam bu sbyar ba dang // phra mo gos kyang dgos pa med// gser gyi gdu bu mi dgos te// mu tig phreng ba dgos ma yin// sor gdu
293b3: dag kyang mi dgas te/ / de kun pa rtag chos can no// bdag cag ngan par 'gro rnams su// 'gro bar mi 'brur srog tshol lo// lhan pas kyi ni bde ba dang // chos kyi sbyin pa don du gnyer// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dgos te/
293b4: 'khor los sgyur rgyal ma yin no// rab tu bzang ba'i gling bor nas// 'khor los sgyur ba 'chi bar 'gyur// bu yang phyi bzhin mi 'brang ste// chung ma bu mo rnams kyang min// rin chen sna bdun phyin las// phyi bzhin 'brang
293b5: ba ma yin no/ / skye bo med po bsdus pa yang// phyi bzhin 'gro ba ma yin te// mdun du rlig pa 'dam yin no// de ltar phyin cad mi 'gyur ro// tshe gcig gi ni rgyal po las// mi rtag pas ni 'khyam 'gyur te// sdig pa'i las rnams/
293b6: mar byas pas// de dag sems dmyal du 'bod ltung // rin chen sna bdun rdzu 'phrul ches// phyogs bzhi kun du bskor ba las// gang tshe ru 'bod smin pa'i tshe// rdzu 'phrul de ni gang du song// sa gang dag na yod min pa// shi nas rdzu
293b7: 'phrul byed mi nus/ / gnas brtan bdag cag rnams la gson// gad na de bzhin gshegs par bzhud// pa dang ma ni ji lta bar// de ni mthong bar rab tu 'dod// bdag cag la ni ma yang med/ pa med bu Ta nam
293b8: kyang med/ / 'jig rten gtso bo de bzhin gshegs// de nyid pha dang ma yin no// de nyid nyi ma zla ba ste// bde ba'i lam ni rab ston pa'o// gang phyir phyin chad mi skye bar// de ni 'khor ba thar mdzad

294a1: ba'o/ / nyon mongs chu bo 'jigs chen dang // chu bo sgrol ba'i gru de'o// de yis sems can rab bsgral te// phyin chad slar ni mi ldog go// byang chub mchog ni rab ston pa// dam pa'i chos kyang des bshad do// bdag cag rnams
294a2: la zas mi dgos/ / rgyal srid 'bras bu mi 'dod de// sems can dmyal bas 'jigs pa ni// lha yi 'jig rten 'gro mi bya// mi yi tshe ni bde ba ste// de na thams cad mkhyen par snang // rang gi las ni nyes byas pas// tshe thung
294a3: rnams na 'khyim pa yin/ / de dag 'chi ba mi shes kyi// 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgyal srid shes// skye dang 'gag pas bslus pa rnams// shes pa med cing 'jigs pa med// mi rtag pas ni sems 'phrul rnams/ phra ba'i
294a4: chos rnams mi shes te/ / phra ba'i dgos pa mi byed la// zhi ba'i dbyings kyang mi shes so// 'chi 'pho la ni skyo med pa// yang dang yang du skye bar 'gyur// yun ring sdug bsngal rab gzir cing // rtag tu dbyug pas brdegs
294a5: byas nas/ gzhan dag gi yang 'phrog byed de// de bzhin bcing zhing bsad pa byas// sngon gyi sdig pas bskul bas na// de dag bcing pa lngas bcings so// de zag kyang ni chad par 'gyur// mya ngan zug rngus zug par 'gyur//
294a6: rnam par shes pa 'gag pa na// snying rje bar ni smre sngags 'don// bdag gi skyob par su 'gyur la// gser dang dngul dang shel dag dang // longs spyod thams cad bdag gis dbul// bdag ni zan du'ang 'gyur bar bya// bran gyi
294a7: tshul du gar gyur pa/ / las rnams thams cad rab tubya// rgyal srid longs spyod bdag mi dgos// nor dang 'bru yang ma yin no// nga gi lus ni bdag mi dgos// sdig pa byed pa mi 'gros te// de ltar gnas brtan bdag cags/
294a8: ba dgos pa ma yin no// gang dag kha zas zhim zos pa// rgyal po rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur// btud ba mchog ni 'thungs pa yi// lha'i bu rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur// cho mcho dgu ro ldan pa// zas dang skom ni rab bshams/

294b1: rgyal po'i mdun du blangs nas su// bzas la ni ldes reg nas// rgyal po rnams ni rol chags// sdig pa mi chung rnams kyang byed// gang la snying po med pa yi// mi rtag rol chags par byed// bdag cag rnams la gom me dgos/
294b2: bza' ba dag kyang dgos ma yin// bdag cag sdug bsngal gang grol ba// chos nyid de 'dra dgos ma yin// sred pa'i bcings las rab grol zhing // sred pa'i nyon mongs rnam thar te// bcings pa kun las rab krol/
294b3: ba'i/ sangs rgyas de la skyabs su dong // drang srong chen po 'jigs mgon la// bdag cag rnams ni skyabs su 'dod// sems can rnams kyis mthong dka' la// phyag 'tshal phyir ni bdag cag 'dod// khyod kyi
294b4: mtshan ni ma 'tshal gyis/ / snyan pa'i mtshan ni bstan du gsol// sman gyi sdes smras pa// khyed dang skye bo thams cad dang // de bzhin ming ni thos par 'dod// sems can gzhon nu bye ba phrag/ stong gis de bzhin
294b5: gshegs pa bskor/ / de dag gis smras pa// khyod ni sangs rgyas nyan thos te// ming ni thab par grags pa yin// skye bo kun kyang de bzhin du// khyod kyi ming ni thos par 'dod// sbas ga/ nga'i ming ni sman gyi sde// nga ni
294b6: sems can rnams kyi sman/ / sman rnams kun gyi dam pa ni// khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya// nad kun gyis btab skye bo yi// nad rnams thams cad zhi bar byed// 'dod chags nad ni nang po che// 'jig rten
294b7: 'jig byed mi bzad pa/ / gang gis blo med 'khyim pa yi// gti mug nad ni che zhing drag/ sems dmyal de bzhin dud 'gro dang // yi dgas rnams su sems can 'gro// byis pa 'di dag zhe sdang zin// de dag ji ltar shi
294b8: bar 'gyur/ / de dag gis smras pa// dge ba'i chos ni 'di thos pas// bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grol// byis pa blo ni mi shes pa// sdug bsngal kun las grol nas kyang // sdig pa'i las ni rnam spangs te// bdag cag

295a1: kyi sbyin pa nyan/ sdig pa thams rnam spangs nas 'jigs pa ma bzad rnams kyang spangs// nad rnams thams cad zhi byed pa// sman pa'i rgyal ba sman pa ste// sdug bsngal ba rnams gas byed pa/
295a2: yang dag sangs rgyas myur du blta// de bzhin gshegs la phyag bya phyir// gnas brtan khyod ni myur du bzhud// phyag byas bdag cag rnams kyi tshig/ 'jig rten rnam par 'dren la gsungs// nad 'di rab tu rna
295a3: bar mdzod/ / lus ni thams cad rab 'bar te/ tshig cing zhi ba med pa yi// mi bzang me ni zhi bar mdzod// lus kyi khur ni khur po che// shin tu mi bzang no ba'i khur// sdug bsngal gzir pa bdag cag la// rtul zhugs
295a4: dam pa thugs rje mdzod/ / skye bo rtag tu zhe sdang dang // gti mug non pa'i bring khyer te// khur las thar pa mi shes pa// de dag yang dang yang khur khyer// thar pa'i lam ni mi shes shing // thar pa'i lam ni ma mthong rnams// 'chib
295a5: rnam par shes mod kyi/ / 'on kyang 'jigs pa mi skyed do// bdag cag la ni nam du yang // 'chi ba med snyam bde bar gnas// kun du 'khrul pas mi shes pa// mthong yang rnam par mi shes so// de dag pa yang mi dran te// nad
295a6: kyis kyang ni rtag gzir cing / / nyon mongs las kyis rab dkrug na// ji ltar khu zas za bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal nyams thag mi shes te// bdag cag dal ba don med do// khyed kyi sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba// ma rig gzhi
295a7: las skyes pa'o/ / 'dus shes 'du byed tshor ba rnams// 'jigs chen lci ba'i khur yin no// gang chos rnam par mi shes pa// byis pa sred pas rab tu 'khyam// lus kyi khur gyis bskor ba ni// 'jig rten du ni don med
295a8: skyes/ gos gtsang shin tu bzang ba dang // khrus dang byug pa dgos pa'o// lus la gang yin 'od pa yi// kha zas zhim po dgos pa ste/ yid 'ong pa yi sil snyan rnga// de bzhin rna bas tshor bar byed/ rin chen bdun las byang

295b1: ba yi/ / gzugs la mig gis chags par byed// zhim pa'i ro rnams thams cad ni// lces kyang tshor bar byed pa ste// 'jam zhing phra ba'i reg pa yang // lus kyis rtag tu tshor bar byed// lus kyis su ni sha gnyis po// dga' bar yang
295b2: ni bsgrubs pa las/ / sems pa med pa'i lus 'di skyes// de la dga' ba su zhig rnyed// de nas bdag rkang dga' byed pa// lha ma ni rab tu bzang gyen yang // 'chi bar 'gyur tshe gos rnams dang // byug pa skyabs su mi 'gyur te//
295b3: lus kyang skyabs su 'gyur min no// gos dang byug pa smos ci dgos// mi zhes bya ba lus yin te// dbugs dang stobs chen rnyed pas 'gyur// so sor rtog pa'i rno ba'i stobs// de ni lus la yon tan che// sngon chad rta dang
295b4: glang po yi/ / kun du bskor nas rtse zhing 'khyam// thar pa'i chos ni ma ster pas// bdag ci sdig pa'i lag la chags// 'jig rten pha rol ma shes nas// rtse bas sdig pa byed du bcug/ bdag ni yang dang yang skyes te// shib
295b5: bdag la yang 'ongs so/ / yang dang yang du mya ngan mthong // smre sngags 'don pas rab tu bcings// ma rnams kyang ni shi ba mthong // pa rnams shi dang gnyen dag dang // sring mo dang ni bu dag dang // rlung ma rnams kyang shi ba mthong /
295b6: mngon par 'du byed kun stong na// sems dang bcas pa su zhig chags// 'dod pas zin pa'i sems kyis su// bdag gis yid brtan rung bar shes// zhi ba'i chos ni mi dmigs te// mchi ba'i la ni mngon dga' med// de phyir
295b7: 'dod pas bsgribs sems kyis/ / bdag gis sbyin pa ma byin no// de bas 'dod dang mnyam sdig med// de ni dung mi ldog go// kun du nor pas bdag cag skyes// 'gro ba mtha' dag kun du nor/ kun du nor pa'i sgra yang nyan/ dam chos
295b8: ma yin yongs su 'dzin/ / thar pa dang ni bsam gtan btsal// lus ni kun du bkur mi bya// 'jig rten don du 'gro ba'i gtso// sangs rgyas ston pa rnams su shog/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten pa dang ma// sangs rgyas lam ni

296a1: rab ston pa/ / 'dzam bu'i gling ni kun du yang // rin chen char pa rab tu 'babs// chos kyi bsdu ba ci 'dra ba// sems can blun pos mi shes te// byang chub tu ni sems bsngos na// chos kyi bsdu ba thob par 'gyur// 'du byed thams/
296a2: cad stong pa ste// de bzhin longs spyod nor yang stong / bdag kyang stong par mthong bas na// mthong nas rab med par 'gyur// gnas brtan sman gyi sde khyod kyis// bdag cag rnams kyi tshig gson cig/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
296a3: kyi phyir/ khyod ni pho nyar bzhud 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams dran nas// byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba med// brtson 'grus ldan zhing dka' thub che// yon tan kun tu sdud par byed// ston de ga la bzhugs par bzhud//
296a4: ston pa bde bar rab sad nas// rgyal ba cung zad mi skyo bar// bdag cag slad du zhu ba mdzod// khyod kyis bdud ni gzhom pa dang // stobs dang bcas pa pham par byas// sems can thams cad yongs 'dzin pa'i// chos
296a5: kyang myur du 'bar bar bya/ / gang gis sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yi// chos ni bdag cag ma thos kyis// bdag cag rnams la phan pa'i phyir// gnas brtan myur du bzhud du gsol// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i//
296a6: de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba/ srid bdag cag me rgal zhes// thams cad gus dang bcas par gnas// sman gyi sdes spras pa// khyed cag da ltar ci zhig mthong // de shig gyen du blta bar byos// de dag rkyen
296a7: bltas pa dang / / khang pa brtsegs pa sum song dang // lnga brgya tham bar tshad pazhig/ kun du yang ni gnas par gyur// rin chen bdun gyis shin du spras// rin chen dra bas lags par brgyan// dbus na ma tog rabatu/
296a8: brgyas// lha rdzas spos kyang rab tu 'bab// de na gnas brtan dris pa ni/ khang brtsegs rin chen dra ba dang // pad ma ze bar kun gnas par// 'di na snang ba 'di ci zhig/ sman gyi sdes smras pa// gnas 'di dag ni byed kyi

296b1: sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir deng shig/ 'jig rten 'das gtso gang yin pa// 'jig rten snang byed de la 'thung // de dag gis smras pa// de yi lam yang ma 'tshal te// de bzhin gshegs pa 'angam mthong na// gang na lam
296b2: ma 'tshal bas/ phyag 'tshal du ni gang du mchi// sran gyi sdes smras pa// nam mkha' mtha' yas ji bzhin du// ga par rung ba ma yin pas// bdud rtsi rab sbyin ston pa la// phyag 'tshal byir na 'gro ma nus// ji ltar ri
296b3: gnas pa ltar/ / ston pa de yang gnas na bzhugs// ri rab gzhal du rung ba yin// rgya mtsho chen po gting chod zin// stong gsum rdul phran dpag tu rung // sangs rgyas 'byung ba shes ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' phyog
296b4: bcu nas/ / 'jig rten snang bar mdzad la 'dud// smras pa/ 'jig rten mgon po bdag cag gzigs// bdag cag bsam pa rdzogs par mdzod// bdag cag sems kyis ston pa la// phyag bgyis de nas 'bras bu thob//
296b5: sman gyi sdes smras pa// ston pa dril mi chags te// phreng ba ma yin byug pa min// gang gis 'dus byas grol 'gyur ba// sems can rnams kyi rgyu 'dzin to// gang gis yid ni btul byas shing // sangs rgyas la yang
296b6: skyabs song ba/ / de la bdud ni mi bzad mchog/ thab mo rgol bar mi byed do// 'chi ba'i dbang du mi 'gro yi// gzungs ni myur du rnyed par 'gyur// de sems rab tu dang byas nas// de nas ston pa mthong bar 'gyur// de nas
296b7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ka la bing ka'i sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan las langs nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la bde
296b8: logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer brgyad khri bzhi stong byung ste// 'od zer de dag gis thams cad dang

297a1: ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur/ / sems can dmyal ba chen po sum bcu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang khyab par gyur/ lha'i gnas sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyang snang bar
297a2: gyur/ / 'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs sha stag la 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang le brgan dang shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste// 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung /
297a3: nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad bgyis nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i tshug/
297a4: tu nub par gyur pa'i 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag la
297a5: skabs dbye bar gnang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub/
297a6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sman gyi sde khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyis sems rangs par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
297a7: 'das sems can gzhon nu bye ba stong phrag sum bcu byung ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos phra ba bstan pa rtogs nas sems can rgan po rnams la sems can rgan po khyed rnams ni chos mi shes so/ /
297a8: rtag tu chos ma yin pa dang / mi dge ba la chags pa'o zhes phra mo rnams mi snyan pa mchi zhing yongs su rjod la gnod pa bgyid na// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du tshig snyan pa yid du 'ong ba 'di dag smras/

297b1: da/ gA gsas/ / sa na sha dgas pa smra/ ma sa san
297b2: dag tshas thams cad kyi don 'a du chud par 'gyur/ / yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur// de dag thams cad gzungs rtags par 'gyur/ deng byin chadas bcol gnas par 'gyur// deng chos kyi chen po la/
297b3: sgra 'byin par 'gyur// deng chos chen po'i rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// sman gyi sde khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag mthong ngam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong /
297b4: lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sman gyi sde deng nyid sems can gzhon nu 'di dag khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi nang du zhugs nas chos mngon par rtogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro//
297b5: deng nyid dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// deng chos kyi rnga chen po rdung bar 'gyur te// lha'i ris du ma zhig deng chos mngon par rtogs pa thob par byed par 'gyur ro//
297b6: sems can dmyal ba'i sems can log par lhung ba la gnas pa mang po dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan pa thos nas 'khor ba bsnyil te rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe sems
297b7: can nan po bye ba stong phrag dgub cu thams cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag thams cad kyang chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sman gyi sde de dag thams cad na sngag bsngal
297b8: thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/ / sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba sgrub par 'gyur ro// sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni chos chen po'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur/

298a1: do// klan gyi rje phyogs bzhir ltos shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyigyi phyogs pani kun du bltas pa dang / shang phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA gling bye ba phrag lnga bcu'i byem snyed/
298a2: 'od// phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang rtswa'i klung bye ba phrag drug bcu'i bye ma snyed 'o/ nub phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba zag bdun cu byes snyed 'o / byang phyogs nas kyang chub /
298a3: dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong/ 'og gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed 'o/ steng gi phyags nas byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag
298a4: brgya'i bye ma snyed 'ong ste/ / de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ce/
298a5: gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' bar snang la gzugs nag po dang / gzugs dmar po gda' bci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde gang bar snang la gzugs nag po dang / gzugs dmar po mthong ba 'di ci yin/
298a6: mi shes sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni mkhyen te sman gyi sde 'dan bdud yin no// sman gyi sde mthong bar 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs pa 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis ga/
298a7: stsal pa/ sman gyi sde byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam pa 'di lta bu lhags so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang
298a8: lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams kyi rkyen gyis te/ de sems can thams cad pasam gtan gyi chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sman gyi sde khyod kyis sems can gzugs sna tshogs 'dir lhags

298b1: dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs sna tshogs 'dir lhags pa dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig/
298b2: brgya stong gi bye ma snyed cig rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus gnas te/ gzugs sna tshogs kha dog sna tshogs dbyibs sna tshogs bdag gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'phags pa'i chos kyi gnas la gnas te byang chub sems
298b3: dpa' de dag 'khor dang bcas nas chos kyi gnas la gnas pa mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du dpa' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem
298b4: dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dang / byang chub sems dpa' gsar snying de dag kun dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
298b5: kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / // 'phags bzung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus
