298b6: te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya tsin t+ya pra b+ha sa nir de sha nA ma d+hamA bar+yA ya// bod skad du/ 'phags pa khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos
298b7: kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na// bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
298b8: kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por gnas/

299a1: nas bzhugs te/ rgyal po dang blon po chen po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal gyi ma dang / nang ma rnams kyis ste stang du byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das/
299a2: kyis bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / klog pa dang / mang ba bzang po myang po brnyes so// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su
299a3: ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ gdung phun sum tshogs
299a4: pa/ tshe rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims can sum tshogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba ye shes gzigs pa phun
299a5: sum tshogs pa'o zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa'i sgra dang / snyan pa 'jig rten du rgya cher mngon du byung bar gyur to// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lhad
299a6: mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ u0f7fmar dge gdon bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang go/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs sud
299a7: yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// spyan lnga dang ldan te/ sha'i spyan dang / lha'i spyan dang / chos kyi spyan dang / shes rab kyi sman dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs
299a8: can spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu dang / gcer bu gnyen gyi bu pa rnams ni tshar bcad do// bcom ldam 'das kyi bstan pa 'di lha dang mi rnams kyis yang dag par bzung zhing 'bar ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus

299b1: kye tshe chos gos dang / sham thabs bsnams te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ mdun dugazes
299b2: pa dang / g.yas g.yon du gzigs pa mdzad pa dang / bskam pa dang / brkyang ba mdzes pa dang / chos gos skam sbyar dang / bsil zan dang / na bza'i tshogs dang / lhung bzed bsnams pa mdzes pa dang / sku mdog gser gyi
299b3: kha dog lta bu dang / 'od 'dom gang bas mtshan me mun pa mun nag gi nang na me'i phung po lta bu dang / tshes bcu lnga'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang // nyi ma shar blta bur phyogs su snang zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu gnyis dang ni ldan te/
299b4: grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por grong khyer du gshegs pa na/ cho 'phrul ngo mtshar
299b5: mang du byung ba chos rnam pa 'di dag byung ste/ skyes bu dam pa 'dren pa de gshegs pa'i tshe/ der cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba chen po gang dag byung ba de dag brjod par byas shin du dang ba'i sems kyis nyon cig/ long ba rnam
299b6: kyi ni mthong ngo / / 'on pa rnams kyis ni thos so// gcer bu rnams kyis ni gos rnyed do// smon pa rnams kyis ni dran pa thob po// grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad ni thal mo sbyar te/ bde bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
299b7: rnga be che dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / sgra snyan dag ni ma brdungs bar sgra 'byung ngo // dang ba dang / ngur ba dang / khrung khrud dang / rma bya dang / ne tse dang / khu byug dag kyang yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin to// gang dag gter stor ba de dag
299b8: gis ni gter rnams rnyed par gyur to/ / gser dang dngul las byas pa'i snod rnams kyang ma dgrol bar sgra byung ngo // sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing // 'gul te/ sems can rnams skyabs med par yang ma

300a1: gyur cig/ yid dang ba rab tu thob bo// smra ba'i mchog dam pa sangs rgyas kyis gang dang gang du zhabs kyis gom pa bor ba de dang der pad ma dri ma med cing // legs par gnas pa rnams byung ngo // dud 'gro/
300a2: skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang bde ba rnyed nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro// bud med gang dag sbrum pa de dag kyang mi bde med pa nyid du gzugs bzang zhing bsta
300a3: na sdug pa dag btsas so/ / sems can rnams la yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / ti mug rnams kyis gnod par gyur pa med do// rab tu sdang ba'i sems med par phan tshun smra ste/ dper na pa'am ma zhig bu cig/
300a4: ba la smra ba bzhin no// srang gi g.yas g.yon rnams kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to// nam mkha' laganas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang me tog sil ma dag mngon par gtor to// sems sdug bsngal bar gyur/
300a5: pa gang yang med do// sems can gang dag na bar gyur pa de dag kyang nad med par 'gyur te/ bde ba thob bo// bde bar gshegs pa gshegs pa na sems can so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag kho na la gzigs so//
300a6: snyam du sems so// so so nas bdag nyid bsod snyom 'bul zhing mi'i 'dren pa la brten nas bdag kho na bsod snyoms kyi 'bras bu la sbyor ro snyam du sems te/ de gshegs pa tsam yang gzhal bar sra ba
300a7: ma yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du mthar chags su bsod snyoms bzhes shing gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das grong par gyi dbus shig tu gshegs pa dang / de'i tshe khang
300a8: stong zhig tu khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ bltan sdug pazhig bor bar gyur te/ lag pa g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo khar bcug nas/ 'jib cing 'dug pa la gyi 'am/ lce spyang gang dag khang stong der ltas/

300b1: bad dag kyang bye'u de la bu'i dbang pos pa ldags shing 'ongs ste/ 'di ltar sngon byas pa'i dag pa'i rtsa bas khye'u dal 'che ba mi byed do// khang stong dang skye bo bal po che dag kyang 'jug cing 'byung ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrub
300b2: bal po che 'jug cing 'byung ba gzigs nas mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang tu skye bo phal po che 'di dag 'jug cing 'byung ba'i khang stong den ci yod lto// de ga ces
300b3: bka' stsal nas/ / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan te// khang stong gal ba der song nas byin pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba// mdzes pa/ bstan sdug bzhig lag pa g.yas pa'i 'dzub
300b4: mokhar bcug ste/ 'jib cing 'dug la mig gnyis mi 'dzums par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la lta ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom
300b5: ldan 'das la skabs de gsol pa/ / bcom ldan 'das khang stong de na khye'u bor ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa// lhan sdug pa/ rin po che'i gzugs ltar mchis pa/ mig mi 'dzums par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad
300b6: la lha bzhig mchis so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kye mkhye'u 'di ni sngon gyi sbyar ba phun sum tshogs pa ste/ nga'i legs par bshad pa'i don shes par nus shing bskal pa can no snyam nas/ khye'u de la thugs
300b7: brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dge ba la gzung ba'i gyi khang stong ga la ba der gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das der gshegs nas phyogs gcig tu bzhugs te/ phyogs cig tu bzhugs nas/ khye'u la tshigs/
300b8: su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ sbrul dang gnod sbyin rtsu ba yi// dur khrod 'jigs pa che 'di ni// byis pa ji ltar mi 'jigs shing // khyod de gcig pu 'di na 'dug/ de nas khye'u des/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon

301a1: gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das la skang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la// thub pa'i dbang phyug su zhig 'jigs// thams cad mkhyen pa smra ba'i mchog/ ji ltar 'dir
301a2: mchis las gang lags/ / bdag gcig bdag gi gang ma mchis// bdag kyang gang gI'ang ma lags te// bdag ni su'i lags de ma mthong // bdag gi su lags de ma mthong // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon
301a3: cad sdig pa byas pa'i las/ / de yi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste/ khang pa stong pa 'dir bor nas// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong ba yin// khye'us gsol pa/ gau ta ma khar stong snyam pa yin/ 'du shes dadung mnga' babalta// byang chub snyid
301a4: po khyod bzhugs nas/ / 'du shes yongs su ma mkhyen tam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gangs ni 'dra shes yongs shes te/ nga la 'du shes yod ma yin// khyod nyid pha ni snying brtse bas// khang par stor pa 'dir 'odra/
301a5: so// khye'us gsol pa/ sems can dag ni bar 'ga' yang // gang tshe shin du mi dmigs pa// de tshe thugs rje gang du byung // khyod ni su la thugs brtse mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag med zhib stong pa
301a6: nyid/ sems can 'di dag mi shes te// de dag nyid la snying brtse phyir// bsod nams spyad pa spyod pa yin// khye'us gsol pa// stong pa zhi bar thugs chud nas// zhi ba stong pa nyid mkhyen kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa da dung du//
301a7: phyin ci log kyang ma spangs sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zhi ba stong pa nyid rtogs nas// sems can yongs su smin bya phyir// 'dren pa chos ston mdzad pa 'di// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje yin//
301a8: bye'us gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dadung du// khyod kyis byin ci log ma spangs// sems can 'du shes ma mchis na// thugs rje gang du skye bar 'gyur// de bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems

301b1: ni rab bzung nas/ / yod min sems can rnams la yang // me mchog rnams ni go gyon pa// rang byung rnams kyi byin rlabs so// khye'us gsol pa/ dngos po gang na mi dmigs pas// go cha thams cad brdzun pa lags// dngos po
301b2: mamachis chos rnams la/ / go cha dmigs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams dngos po yod min yang // srog chags rnams la chos ston 'di// 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi// thug
301b3: rjes rnam par rol pa yin/ / khye'us gsol pa// chos ni yi ge ma mchis na// bshad pa gung na ga la mchis// 'jig rten rnams la sku mdzad dam// chos ma lags pa chos bshad dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
301b4: gang ni 'jig rten sku ma yin// chos ma yin pa nga mi smra// phyin ci log gyur sems can gyi// nyon mongs sel bar dbyed do// khye'us gsol pa/ nyon mongs rtsa ba ma mchis te/ nang ngam phyi rol rnams na yang / de dag
301b5: rnams kyi gnas ma mchis/ / nyon mongs ji ltar rnam par sbyar// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyin ci log las byung ba rnams// yongasu btags las skyes pa ste// rtog pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir// srog
301b6: chags rnams la chos ston to/ / bye'us gsol pa/ rnam brtag mang po ci 'tshal te// sems ni rab bzhin 'od gsal zhing // de la nyon mongs mi 'byung ste// nam kyang nyon mongs de mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
301b7: stsal pa/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te// sems cani rtag tu 'od gsal kyang // blo bur nye ba'i nyon mongs kyis// so so'i skye bo nyon mongs 'gyur// khye'us gsol pa/ nyon mongs dmigs su ma mchis te/ de dag phyogs na
301b8: mi gnas na/ / glo bur du ni ji ltar 'gyur// de zhus bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dper na sprin rnams par snang la// snang yang de dag de bzhin min// nyon mo ngas 'byung ba'ang de

302a1: 'dra ste/ snang yang de dag de bzhin min// khye'us gsol pa/ ma nor de bzhin gang lags pa// chos gnas nyid de chos nyid do// mnor de bzhin nyid chos la// nor bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs// bcom ldan 'das
302a2: kyis bka' stsal pa/ byis pa 'du shes ldan rnams kyi// log par rnam par gang brtags pa/ blo de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs rnams 'byung ba yin// khye'us gsol pa/ skye ma mchis pas rab bye ba/
302a3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang zhig byung // skye ba ma mchis chos rnams la// sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'thad ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba'i med par skye ba ni// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu bstan//
302a4: kun rdzob tha snyed btags pa ste// dam pa'i don du yod ma yin// khye'us gsol pa/ da dur khyod la don dam dang // kun rdzob 'du shes gnyis mda' ste// theg pa gcig lam 'gal 'gyur ba// gau ta ma khyod kyis bka' stsal to//
302a5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni lam dang 'gal mi byed// 'gal ba med par de gnas te// mi 'thun sems can sdums kyang byed// khye'u khyod de ltar shes par gyis// khye'us gsol pa/ sems can
302a6: de ni mi dmigs na/ / gau ta ma khyod kyi ci sdums mdzad// chos rnams sngon gyi mtha' la gzigs// gang gi kun nas nyon mongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha' dang / de bzhin da ltar
302a7: byung ba dang / byang chub dam pa rtogs gyur nas// srog chags rnams la chos ston to// khye'us gsol pa/ rdzogs sangs rgyas shes sgrogs mdzad cing // nyid kyis mkhyen pa sgrogs mdzad de/ 'di ltar bdag tu sgro 'dogs
302a8: pas/ / khyod ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal che// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni bdag la mi stod de// de bzhin gshegs la brnyas mi byed// de bzhin nyid ni rab tu ston// des na de bzhin gshegs shes bya// khye'us

302b1: gsol pa/ bdod du ma mchis de bzhin nyid// de na de nyid ma mchis na// skra ska dam mchis sra bshad pa// mkhyen bzhin log par bka' ma sum// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ma dathams cad lag pa ste/
302b2: de bzhin nyid las byung ba yin// de bzhin nyid ni rtogs pas na// de la skyon med yon tan med// khye'us gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yis na// bdag gi spobs pa 'di skyes te// 'di 'dril lan dag gang gsol pa// rdzogs
302b3: sangs rgyas la bzod par gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can chos gos kyi nang nas byung ste// khye'u de logs su brkyang ba dang / de nas khye'u des bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi sor mo la
302b4: bzung ste langs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de khang stong nas bsnams te/ srad du bzhag pa dang / de na skye bo phal po che dag 'di ltar khye'u 'di 'di kho na ltar nyon mongs par gyur kyang / bdag nyid chen po'i chos 'di
302b5: lta bu'i lan 'debs pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ngo mtshar to snyam nas/ / ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
302b6: khye'u khyod kyi las kyi sgrib pazad kyis/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dran par gyis la skye bo'i tshogs chen po la yang shes par gyis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston cig/ de nas khye'u de sa las mi bdun srid tsam du 'phags
302b7: nas lus las 'od phyung ste/ 'od des mnyan yod thams cad dang / 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang ba chen po rgyas par gyur to// 'od des brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa lha brgya
302b8: stong mang po gzhan dag la yang yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste// lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsha

303a1: te/ lha'i me tog dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas// bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni snang bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od kyis snang /
303a2: bar bgyis nas/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyis so// zhes ched du brjod pa de skad ched du brjod de/ de ltar khye'u de'i ming snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar btags so// bcom
303a3: ldan 'das kyis kyang khye'u 'di snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bya bar gyur cig ces/ khye'u de'i ming la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do// de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bar snang do las babs te/ sa la
303a4: 'dug pa dang / de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas 'di lta ste dper na/ grogs po lo brgyad lon pa'i lus gzugs yongs su grub par gyur pa de 'dra bar 'dug go// de nas lha'i dbang
303a5: lo brgya byin gyis khye'u de la lha'i ras bcos bu zung cig byin te/ kye khye'u ngal snying brtse ba'i phyir ras bcos bu'i zung 'di gyon la gcer bur ma 'dug shig/ de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas
303a6: lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gos kyi rgyan bgos pas mdzes pa ma yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi rgyan thogs
303a7: ni mdzes so/ / kau shi ga de lta mod kyi 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan gang dag yin pa de dag nyon cig/ byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa'
303a8: rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ byang chub kyi snying po brgyan par 'gyur ro// ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i rgyan ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ sems can thams

303b1: cad mngon du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / dam bcas pa brtan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi brgyan te/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi brgyan te/
303b2: spya da g.yo sel bar 'gyur ro// sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi brgyan te/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
303b3: gos kyi brgyan te/ thams cad khyad par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// nga rgyal med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi brgyan te/ ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa ni
303b4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi brgyan te/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa'i ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi brgyan te/ chags pa med pa'i/
303b5: ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nor thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims yong
303b6: su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi brgyan te/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa dang nges pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi brgyan te/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi
303b7: ro dang sba sa dal bu'i tshig tu 'gyur ro/ / dam bcas pa brtan zhing sems mi zhum pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi brgyan te/ bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan dang /
303b8: rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'din dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi brgyan te/ mngon par shes pa chen po de ye sha yos su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshig pa

304a1: dbye ba shes pa'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi brgyan te/ bag la nyal dang lta bar smra ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam
304a2: kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ 'khor ba yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la zhes 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don la skyo ba med par 'gyur ro//
304a3: zang zing med par chos ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ shes rab kyis bdag dang gzhan sgrol bar 'gyur ro// chos sgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ nyon mongs pa thams
304a4: cad spongs par 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rkyen 'di lta bu dag dang ldan pa de nam yang gcer bu ma yin par rig par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la
304a5: shin du dga' ba dang dad pa skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du// bcom ldan 'das kyis ras bcos bu'i zung 'di len par stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
304a6: kyis khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / khye'u ras bcos bu'i zud 'di long la gyon cig/ de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ pus mo g.yas
304a7: pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ras bcos bu'i zung blangs nas bgos so de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po
304a8: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ / de na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / tshong dpon dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ khye'u snang

304b1: ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la yang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis bsod snyoms bzhes te/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi
304b2: khyab pa'i ma'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs so/ / gshegs nas kyang cang mi gsung bar phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mngo tsha nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir sgor
304b3: mabyung ngo / / de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab par rang gi khyim du song nas/ mal tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gi sngon gyi nongs pa yis// khyod kyi mngal du bdag mchis te/ yum gyis nongs pa ma lags
304b4: kyis/ wa ltar gnod par ma mdzad cig/ thugs brtse ldan te bskyed pas na/ bdag gi sbyin gnas khyod lags so// zhal tsham mdzad ma 'dzem par// de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bzhud// de ltar khyod mngal bdag
304b5: mchis pa/ khyod kyis brnyes pa legs par brnyes// lus kyi dge ba'i las rnams kyang // rnam par 'dren la zhu ba mdzod// de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//
304b6: shi ka lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag dang / lha'i spos dag dang / lha'i gos dag bdag la stsol cig/ de dag bdag gi skyed pa'i ma 'di la stsal to// 'dis de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyis nas/ bla na med pa
304b7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur ro/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// khye'u de la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag dang / lha'i spos dag dang / lha'i gos dag byin no// de nas khye'u snang ba bsam
304b8: gyis mi khyab pas mal tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yum cig lha yi me tog man dA ra// blta sdug mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba dang // spos dang na bza' 'di dag blang mdzod la// mi mchog sangs rgyas de la

305a1: 6/ dbul pa mdza// 'dzag tan dgan pa mazas sam dang / nar dang gas kyis mchad pa mtshad ma lags/ gzhan du gang dag cas la sbyor brgyad pa// sa na de dag mdzad pa bgyis par 'gyur/ rkang gnyis dam pan/
305a2: la mchod mdzod la// byang chub mchog tu smon lam brtan par mdzod// bdag ni dus dus khyod kyi drung mchis te// yun ring dus nas skul ba bgyid pa lags// gnod zhing zhum pa'i sems su ma mdzad par// rangs pa'i
305a3: sems dang dga' ba thob mdzod la/ / rang byung rgyal bzhugs pa der bzhud de// skyes bu mchog gi zhabs la phyag mdzod la// mgon po de la me tog spos rnams dang / de bzhin na bza' rnams kyang gtor nas su// rgyal ba
305a4: de las dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed de/ / byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed pa mdzod// byang chub mchog tu sems ni brtan gyur nas// gang dag dad pas rgyal la gus bgyis pa// de dag rnam smin 'jig mgon bka' stsal
305a5: ces/ 'od byung rgyal ba de la zhu ba mdzod// le'u dang tshigs su bcad pa// de nas bud med de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
305a6: sa la mchod pa byas nas/ zhu ba ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gus pa dang bcas par yongs su zhus so// zhu bzhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa 'dis// ngan 'gro 'a/
305a7: mi khom 'gro mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas bye mang mnyes byas nas// mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi
305a8: khyab pa dang / skye bo bal po che gzhan dag dang yang thabs cig tu grong khyer nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab ga la ba der gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

305b1: zas kyi byang mdzod de/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos nyan du gzhug pa'i phyir bzhugs so// de nas yul ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed
305b2: kyi tshal ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas// yul ko sa la'i rgyal
305b3: po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de/ ga la mchis/ de
305b4: nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan nas mthong ste/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis khye'u de'i lus gzugs yongs su grub pa lha las 'das pa'i mdog dang / mi 'jigs pa dang
305b5: tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyis brgyan pa mthong nas// 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon las byas shing bsags pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'di ltar 'di'i lus yongasu dag par gyur snyam mo//
305b6: de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshigs su bcad de smras
305b7: gang dag rtag tu byams sems dag sems ldan/ / gang dag mi brlang mnyen zhing dran ldan la// legs par bsdams shing drang la tshangs spyod pa// de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// gang dag
305b8: sdig pa spong zhing mi spyod la/ / rtag tu dge ba mi chung rnam spel zhing // gnod par sems dang khro ba rnam spongs pa// de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// gang dag sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs

306a1: mchog la/ / gus dang bcas par rtag tu mchod byed cing // gzhan la rdeg 'chog sdigs mo mi byed pa// de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// gang dag gzhan la phrag dog ser sna dang // de bzhin nga rgyal
306a2: dag kyang mi byed la/ / gzhan gyi nyes pa byud pa mi brjod pa// de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// gzhan la gtso bri ba dang smad pa dang // bshud pa dag ni nam yang mi byed cing // gzhan la 'khrul pa'i glags lha mi byed
306a3: pa/ / de dag lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal pogs brgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di chos chen po
306a4: dang ldan pa lags na/ / bcom ldan 'das las kyi sgrib pa gang zhig gis/ khye'u 'di bud med khyim thab ma mchis pa'i mngal du skyes la/ de yang khang stong du bor bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
306a5: bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
306a6: rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
306a7: gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ba/ / rgyal po chen po de'i tshi de'i dris na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de'i ga pal byang chub sems dpa' gnyis shig byung ste/
306a8: lha bzang zhes bya ba dang / sa zhes bya ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog par gyur cing / don du nyung ba/ dben pa la dga' ba/ bsam gtan dang /

306b1: mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar gyur// deHla byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa den chos rgya ngan pa dang ldan par ma gyur te/ lha bzang gi g.yog byed do// de ha cang grong dang / grong dal dang / yu
306b2: 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug ste/ zhugs nas kyang bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang des de la khyod ci'i phyir rnal 'byor dang spong ba la brtson par mi byed par ha cang bya ba mang
306b3: zhing ha cang byed pa mang zhes bsgo zhing bstan to/ / des de la yang dang yang bskul bas khros 'khrugs te yid ma rangs nas/ gnod sems su gyur pa des lus dang sems ma rung bar byas te/ don du bsams nas tshig rtsub bo/
306b4: smras pa/ rnal gyi bu sbyar ma'i bu/ skyes pa gzhan las grub pa khyod kyi ba ma yang med na// khyod la shes rab 'am/ tshul khrims lta ga la yod ces des dan du bsams te/ tshig rtsub po smras pa/ mi mthol mi 'chag
306b5: mi 'dor gyi zhe la 'dzin te/ de byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang de la rtag tu ngan sems dang ldan zhing byams pa'i sems med par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang gis kyang de snod ma yin no//
306b6: zhes nas bkyed pa dang / de de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' lha bzad la ngan du sems shing bsngags pa ma yin brjod de/ snyan pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa
306b7: rjo do/ / de las bsags shing tshegs su byas pa des lus zhigs te/ shi ba'i 'og tu bud med khyim tab med pa'i mngal du skyes so// byang chub kyi sems bsrung bas des na sems can dmyal bar ni ma skyes
306b8: de bcas ma thag tu bud med des lam srang chen por bor te/ der de khyi dang / spyang ki dang / ce spyang rnams kyis zos so// rgyal po chen po tshul 'di 'dra bar 'di bskal pa dgu bcur sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dang / nyam

307a1: thag pa 'di lta bus 'chi ba'i dus byas shing btsas pa btsas pa na yang bor bar gyur te/ yang skye bo phal po che 'di skad du nal gyi bu 'di la khyi dang spyang ki dang / ce spyang rnams za'o// zhes 'dzer to// rgyal po chen po de'itshe
307a2: de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am/ yid gnyis za bar gyur na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khye'u thang ba bsam gyis ma
307a3: pa 'didi'i tshe 'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'di'i las kyi sgrib pa ni zad kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems ni rnam par sbyangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mnyes par byas/ ngan 'gro thams cad
307a4: ni bcad nas/ khye'u snang babasam gyis mi khyab pa 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi mnyes par byas shing / sti stang byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du tshangs
307a5: bar spyod pa spyad do/ / chos yongs su btsal ba la yang brtson par 'gyur to// rgyal po chen po de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag nyid chen po 'di thob bo// rgyal po chen po de ltar na las nag po dang / dkar po dag chung za bar 'ju
307a6: pa med do/ / rgyal po chen po de lta bas na mkhas pas lus kyi las dang / dag gi las dang / yid kyi las bsdams par bya ste/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la yul ko sa la'i rgyal po
307a7: gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bgyi bar gyur pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog par byang chub thob lags sam/ 'on te/ dkud yang byang chub sems
307a8: dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha bzang de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na tshangs

307b1: bar spyad pa spyad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal 'byung zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal pa gsal rgyal gyis 'ad skad ces gsal te// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bums/
307b2: gus par bgyis te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par bgyi'o// bstan par bgyi'o// bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing bsten te/ bstan bkur bgyis
307b3: na dge ba'i chos thob par 'gyur ro/ / dge ba'i chos thob pa'i bsam pa dge bar 'gyur ro// bsam pa dge bas sbyor ba dge bar 'gyur ro// sbyor ba dge bas dge ba'i las bgyid par 'gyur ro// las dge bas 'gro ba dge bar
307b4: mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / 'gro ba dge bas dge ba'i grogs po mgu bar bgyid do// grogs po dge bas sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do// bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// sdig pa ma bgyis shing dge ba'i las bgyis pas bdag la gdud
307b5: par mi 'gyur/ gzhan la gdud par mi 'gyur ro// bdag nor gzhan rjes su srung bas byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi lam la gnas pas lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can
307b6: rnams kyi don pa gyid nus pa dang / skal ba mchis pa dang / mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so// khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras so//
307b7: rgyal po chen po dge pa'i bshes gnyen la brten te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi chos nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la khye'u snang ba bsam gyis
307b8: mi khyab pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos ngu dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / ba

308a1: ma mas rnams pa yang med pa zab par 'gyur/ com ldan das pas bka' stsal pa// bya byung chub sems dpa' ras bzhi dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rtags pa byang du
308a2: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang tub dang / ba ma chos rnams la yang bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhes na// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes la la 'jug par dang / chad pa dang / rtag pa rnam par spong ba
308a3: dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid la mos shing / stong pa nyid spyod yul ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldanan myur du bla na med
308a4: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo chos rnams pa yang bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// khye'u gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na myur
308a5: blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon gyi mtha' dben pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mi 'pho ba dang / daltar byung ba 'jig par shes pa dang / dus
308a6: gsum mnyam pa nyid de bzhi po de dag go/ / gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na lus dben pa dang / sems dben pa dang / chos dben pa dang / las dben pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhig
308a7: zhe na/ sangs rgyas la chos nyid du mthong gi gzugs su ma yin pa dang / chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong gi yi ge dang / sa nges pa'i tshig tu ma yin pa dang / dge 'dun la 'dus ma byas su mthong gi
308a8: tshogs su ma yin pa dang / shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsdu ba'i dngos po mi gtong bas pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs

308b1: par byed pa dang / thabs shes pa la mkhas pa dang / sems can med par rnam par dpyod pa dang / snying rje chen po ste/ khye'u byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par
308b2: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / zab mo'i chos rnams la yang bzod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ khye'u snang pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mi skye ba'i chos
308b3: la bzod par thob par gyur te/ de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis tal bdun srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni
308b4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog du ma byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po
308b5: dang / dkar po dang / le ba rgan dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ kha dog du ma de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyis bar du mngon par byung nas/ zla ba
308b6: dang nyi ma rnams kyi 'od mog mog par byas te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs na/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas
308b7: pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don de zhus pa/ blta sdug bltar 'os gzugs dang mtshan
308b8: rnams dang / / depe byad bzang po rnams kyis rab mdzes shing 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'ad kyi 'od mdzad pa// 'dzum mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol// tshul khrims 'phags shing spyod pa lags spyad pa// tid 'dzin shas

309a1: rab bsags pa'i ye shes 'od/ / rnam grol snying po stobs ldan yang dag gzigs// 'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol// bzod pa'i stobs ldan stobs kyi shugs mnga'// brtson 'grus mngon par 'phags te
309a2: mi spyod pa/ mig tu sdug cing bden pa bzhi gzigs pa// 'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol// rdo rje'i sku mnga' sra brtan mi shigs pa/ sred med bu mthu sred med bu pas mchog/ tshangs dbyangs snga snyan 'jam pa'i dbyangs
309a3: ldan pa/ / 'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol// gzhugs kyang tshangs dang de bzhin lha tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug ma mthong la// gus dang bcas pas kun nas lha bgyid pa// 'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la
309a4: bstan du gsol/ / khyed kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor// mi rtag sgras ni lha dang lha min dang // de bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin rab bskyod pa// 'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol// snang ba mnyes shing mun pa rnam bral ba// na
309a5: nas spyan mnga' mnyam pa nyid bzhugs pa/ / yon tan mchog mnga' yon tan snying po bstan// 'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di
309a6: skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa shing rtal bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das
309a7: kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya'i 'og tu bskal pa/ kun du snang byed ces bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams
309a8: rnam par spyod zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba than

309b1: med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par spyod pa de ni 'di lta bur yongs
309b2: su dag par 'gyur te/ dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa lta bur 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas par 'gyur ro// de la nyan thos brgyad khri'i
309b3: dge 'dun yod par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun yod par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam par spyod pa zhes bya zhing / bskal pa kun du snang byed ces bya
309b4: bar 'gyur zhe na/ / kun dga' bo bar gyi bskal pa brgya stong mang por sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sngon nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa mabyung ste// deng de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ba de na/ gnas
309b5: gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha rnams 'di skad du bskal pa 'di ni kun du snang ba med pa kun du snang ba med pa ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs 'byung ngo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'
309b6: snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa lung bstan pa brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
309b7: skyes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' drug bcu ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// nyan thos lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
309b8: dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir chos kyi rnam

310a1: grangs 'di zung shig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags// 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
310a2: bka' stsal pa/ 'di las kyi slob pa rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba dang / snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis ji srid
310a3: 'tsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa la sti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa byed cing / me tog gi phur ma ri rab tsam gtor ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
310a4: dang / ba dan dang / lha dang mi'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gis mchod pa pas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad 'dzin cing klog la/ kun
310a5: chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston la/ de bzhin du nan tan du byed na 'di ni bsod nams phung po de bas ches mang du bskyed do// kun dga' bo de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mchod pas
310a6: mchod par 'dod pa dang / shes rab kyi snang ba chen po byed par 'dod pas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ klog par bya/ nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya
310a7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor
310a8: dang bcas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten

310b1: yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs s+ho//
310b2: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsu ba ban de ye shes sngas bsgyur ci nus te/ gtan la phab bo// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga tA nA ma bud d+ha k+ke dguk+ta d+ha
310b3: rma bar dA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
310b4: phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul mnyam dka' na chos kyi dgon pa byang chub kyi snying pon nor bu rdo rjes spras pa'i pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge 'khrol bzhugs te/
310b5: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang thabs gcig go//
310b6: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas byang
310b7: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
310b8: dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi nyin zhag gcig go/ / kye rgyal ba'i

311a1: s ras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba'i nyin zhagacig sa
311a2: k ye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'dul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig gi
311a3: rgyal mtshan gyi nyin zhag gcig go/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi bskal pa de'i ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin du rnam par gdon mi cha
311a4: bar pad mo rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dbyangs kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog pa'i
311a5: 'khor lo dbyangs kyi bskal 'de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten
311a6: kyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mar me ldan gyi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
311a7: d ag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mar me ldan gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po'i nyin zhag
311a8: gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer rab tu brgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi

311b1: zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar dka' ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gar 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar dka' ba'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
311b2: pa mngon par shes pa thams cad bla gras 'od zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan gyi nyin zhag gcig go/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan
311b3: gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i thugs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me long gi dkyil 'khor dbyangs kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig
311b4: r ten gyi khams brtag cing bgrang ba la 'jug pa'i tshul 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcur tshad pa'i rdul phra rab snyed 'das pa'i pha rol na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
311b5: y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i sa yongs su spyod pa'i khyad par can 'jig rten gyi 'ams pad mo dpal
311b6: gyi nyin zhag gcig go/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/
311b7: 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho ba 'byam
311b8: dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sde ba dran par

312a1: dang na gagags pa da mapa yang dag par rdzogs panas sa rnas kyis gas/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa 'od bsam
312a2: khyab pa'i rgyal po dga' zhing de skad ces smras so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam
312a3: gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal pos smras pa la mngon par bstod do/ / / 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
312a4: rdzogs sos+ho/ / / 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thag pa chen po'i mdo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
312a5: ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / / byang chub sems dpa' dge/ 'dun chen pa dang
312a6: sa gcig tu bzhugs te/ lha dang / krA nga / gnang ston dang za dang / l+h+wam yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / ma'am tsa dang / 'phye chen po dang /
312a7: me dang / mi ma yin pa du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyi bltas nas chos ston to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya ba zhig
312a8: 'khor 'dus pa der 'dus par 'gyur te 'dug pa des 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong nas ltad mor gyur te/ de stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzarate

312b1: pus mo g.yas pa'i ltengs la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba da logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdudabacom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
312b2: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas 'byung ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma zhig 'das na gang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ci 'dra ba ma gyu lags so//
312b3: bcom ldan 'das bdag gi zhu ba bstan pa 'di'i lan stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis thos na yang dbugs phyin par 'gyur lags so//
312b4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yang dag par gzeng stod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
312b5: rigs kyi bu nyon gcig dang / dris pa lan gdab pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang des sngon so so'i skye bo'i dus na kun du bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du
312b6: byas pa de bstan par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes
312b7: bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ / de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin zhes bya ba zhig shin du ma dad cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos lnga dang ldan zhing / chos 'du

313a1: ba la rgyab kyis phyogs so/ / dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhig khyim bdag de la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang dang yang du rgyun mi 'chad par khyim bdag de'i khyim du 'gro'o// re shig
313a2: na dus kyi mthus khyim bdag de dge slong de la rje su chags pa dang bcas pa'i sems su gyur nas/ re shig na khyim bdag des legs par bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu dris so// de nas dge slong des skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir
313a3: dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir khyim bdag de la dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston te
313a4: khyim bdag dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o// des 'khor phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur te/ gang dang gang du skyes par tshes dang ldan pa'i sems can
313a5: rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ 'khor mang po dang lus phun sum tshogs nas gzugs bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur te/ brtsal mi dgos par yo byad rnams 'byor bar 'gyur/
313a6: lus sra zhing bstan la lus phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / de la riring brtsigs pa rnams kyang sgrib pa mi byed de/ phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur// de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgul yid rangs
313a7: bar gyur nas dge slong de'i nang ba la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ston cig dang / des bdag la mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung bas khyim
313a8: bdag de'i bsam bshes nas yang dag par rab tu bstan te/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o// des na lci bgasang bsres pa'i// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya// sems can kun dang thun mong du// 'das pa'i

313b1: sangs rgyas gang yin dang / gang dag ma 'ongs da ltar byung // byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gang yod pa// de dag rnams la yongs su bsngo// de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor yug dgra// 'khor/
313b2: kyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya ste// 'jig rten dbang dang byams pa dang / thub pa skyes mchog nam mkha' dang // kun du bzang po blo ldan dang // gsad pa ba'i bdag po dang // 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur ba dang /
313b3: sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang // de bzhin sa'i snying po ste// de dag gi ched du dkyil 'khor brgyad bya'o// khyim bdag 'di ni dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi nam grangs yin te/
313b4: 'doni bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de las mngon sum du thos so// khyim bdag gzhan yang nyon cig/ kun nas skal ba 'thun pa'i// 'khor rnams gang zhig
313b5: 'dod pa des/ dkyil 'khor brgyad ni bri bar bya// gang zhig brgya byin nyid dang ni// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bdag po dang // lha mi rgyal po'i rgyal srid dang // blo ldan sna tshogs gzugs
313b6: bzang 'dod/ / rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchog brgyad bya// seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa 'di ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de ltar mi
313b7: blta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to// seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba
313b8: de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyi 'am/ / yid gnyis zan de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba'i khyim bdag tu gyur to// ngas pha rol

314a1: bya/ du byin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i bar dang / sangs rgyas nyid thob kyis bar du tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum de dang de dag tu chos 'di kun du bsten to// sgoms so// //
314a2: mang du byas so// rigs kyi bu gang gis na ra'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa 'di 'gro bar gyur pa'i rgyu ni de yin no// rkyen ni de yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa nas
314a3: byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa dang / / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
314a4: rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo// / rdzogs s+ho/
314a5: na gyi lo ts+tsha ba ba d+he pe shes sdes bskur cing nus te gtan la bab pa/ bathashis pa zur cig/ ye d+ha ma he tra pra b+ha bA/ te tun te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba da ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e bamA b+ha dI ma hA ma shra ma NaH//
